original: bcu drug rnams te /
analyzed: bcu drug rnams te /
translated: These are the sixteen.

original: sna bug dag tu'o //
analyzed: sna bug dag tu'o //
translated: They are in the nostrils.

original: 'pho ba bcu gnyis su rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: 'pho ba bcu gnyis su rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: The twelve movements are posited as follows:

original: dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad bu ga gcig tu rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad bu ga gcig tu rgyu ba ste /
translated: Eighteen hundred breaths move in one nostril.🔽They move in the five maṇḍalas of earth, water, fire, wind, and space, respectively, and in the same way, they move below, on the left, on the right, above, and in the middle, in order.🔽They move in the same way as the number of nāḍīs in the throat and the crown are reversed, and in each, there are three hundred breaths that are more than sixty.

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam @202b mkha'i dkyil 'khor lnga rnams so sor rgyu ba bzhin dang / rim pa ji lta bar 'og dang g-yon dang g-yas dang steng dang dbus rnams su rgyu ba bzhin dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo'i rtsa'i grangs bzlog pa bzhin dang so sor drug cu lhag pa'i sum brgya'i dbugs kyi bdag nyid can gyi dbyu gu drug cu rnams kyis nyin mtshan nyid kyis na /
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam @202b mkha'i dkyil 'khor lnga rnams so sor rgyu ba bzhin dang / rim pa ji lta bar 'og dang g-yon dang g-yas dang steng dang dbus rnams su rgyu ba bzhin dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo'i rtsa'i grangs bzlog pa bzhin dang so sor drug cu lhag pa'i sum brgya'i dbugs kyi bdag nyid can gyi dbyu gu drug cu rnams kyis nyin mtshan nyid kyis na /
translated: Since there are sixty periods of sixty breaths in a day and night,🔽the four empty nāḍīs are posited in the four petals of the navel lotus.

original: lte ba'i chu skyes kyi zlum po bzhi pa la stong pa'i rtsa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i dor drang ba'i don yin gyi nges pa'i don ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lte ba'i chu skyes kyi zlum po bzhi pa la stong pa'i rtsa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i dor drang ba'i don yin gyi nges pa'i don ni ma yin no //
translated: This is the provisional meaning of the chariot of the sun and so on for the disciples; it is not the definitive meaning.

original: lte ba'i chu skyes kyi zlum po gsum pa la rtsa bzhi spangs nas rtsa bcu gnyis rnams su dus sbyor dang 'pho ba bcu gnyis rnam par gzhag pa na /
analyzed: lte ba'i chu skyes kyi zlum po gsum pa la rtsa bzhi spangs nas rtsa bcu gnyis rnams su dus sbyor dang 'pho ba bcu gnyis rnam par gzhag pa na /
translated: In the third circle of the navel lotus, having omitted four channels, the twelve channel-petals are arranged as the twelve houses and the twelve transits.

original: ci ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
analyzed: ci ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
translated: As it is outside, so it is inside.

original: zhes pa yang legs par gnas so //
analyzed: zhes pa yang legs par gnas so //
translated: This is well established.

original: 'di ni thams cad du 'dod pa yang ma yin no zhes gsung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad du 'dod pa yang ma yin no zhes gsung ngo //
translated: But this is not accepted by all.

original: thams cad 'dod pa ni rtsa gsum rnams su nyin mtshan nyid gyis drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi dbugs rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'dod pa ni rtsa gsum rnams su nyin mtshan nyid gyis drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi dbugs rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Those who accept all say that in the three channels there are twenty-one thousand six hundred breaths, by day and night.

original: de ltar yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ltos pas stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang dbyer med pa'i ngo bo'i sngags dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir sngags zlos pa yang rdzogs par grub pa lhan cig skyes pa gnas zhes pa'i mthar thug pas gsal bar byas
analyzed: de ltar yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ltos pas stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang dbyer med pa'i ngo bo'i sngags dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir sngags zlos pa yang rdzogs par grub pa lhan cig skyes pa gnas zhes pa'i mthar thug pas gsal bar byas
translated: Thus, in dependence on the stage of completion, the recitation of mantra is also clarified by the ultimate reality of the innate, which is the nature of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion and the inseparability of mantra.

original: so // de gsungs pa /
analyzed: so // de gsungs pa /
translated: This is stated:

original: khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag dang / de bzhin kho nar brgya phrag drug //
analyzed: khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag dang / de bzhin kho nar brgya phrag drug //
translated: six hundred.

original: rnal 'byor dbang po nyin mtshan du //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang po nyin mtshan du //
translated: The lord of yogis

original: bzlas brjod kyis ni grangs byed do //
analyzed: bzlas brjod kyis ni grangs byed do //
translated: counts the recitations day and night.

original: zhes so // de ltar rig pa bzlas pa'i sems brtan pa na 'dod chags la sogs pa sems kyi rang bzhin rnams nges su 'jug cing /
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar rig pa bzlas pa'i sems brtan pa na 'dod chags la sogs pa sems kyi rang bzhin rnams nges su 'jug cing /
translated: Thus, when the mind is stabilized by the recitation of the vidya, attachment and so forth, the natures of the mind, definitely enter.

original: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag yongs su dor nas aa wa dh'u t'i ru zhugs pa'i rlung ni phyir 'byung ba med cing nyin mtshan gyi tshul med pa ;
analyzed: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag yongs su dor nas aa wa dh'u t'i ru zhugs pa'i rlung ni phyir 'byung ba med cing nyin mtshan gyi tshul med pa ;
translated: The winds that have abandoned the lalanā and rasanā and entered the avadhūti do not come out and there is no day and night.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma zin pa'i sgra gcan bzhin du rim gyis kyang 'gags pa ni yon tan skyed par byed do //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma zin pa'i sgra gcan bzhin du rim gyis kyang 'gags pa ni yon tan skyed par byed do //
translated: Like Rāhu seizing the moon and sun, the gradual cessation of the winds generates qualities.

original: gang gsungs pa /🔽zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags na //
analyzed: gang gsungs pa / zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags na //
translated: As it is said:🔽When the channels of the moon and sun are blocked,

original: bshad dang gci ba'i rtsa dag 'gag / sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gags pa na //
analyzed: bshad dang gci ba'i rtsa dag 'gag / sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gags pa na //
translated: the channels of feces and urine are blocked.🔽When the Rāhu channel is blocked,

original: 'og tu khu ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur //
analyzed: 'og tu khu ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur //
translated: the downward-moving wind is blocked.

original: @203a * // dbu mar srog ni nyin mtshan du //
analyzed: @203a * // dbu mar srog ni nyin mtshan du //
translated: In the central channel, the life-force enters day and night.

original: zhugs pas nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: zhugs pas nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
translated: By this, the yogi takes away the diseases.

original: srog ni tshes kyi nyin bcings pa //
analyzed: srog ni tshes kyi nyin bcings pa //
translated: The life-force is bound in the lunar days.

original: 'dis ni mkha' la spyod nyid ster //
analyzed: 'dis ni mkha' la spyod nyid ster //
translated: This bestows the state of moving in space.

original: zla gcig snying la gnas gsang bas //
analyzed: zla gcig snying la gnas gsang bas //
translated: The moon abides in the heart for a month.

original: rnal 'byor ba la 'chi med nyid //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba la 'chi med nyid //
translated: The yogi has immortality.

original: zla ba drug tu lte par bsregs //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu lte par bsregs //
translated: The moon is burned in the navel for six months.

original: des ni thams cad mkhyen nyid ster //
analyzed: des ni thams cad mkhyen nyid ster //
translated: This bestows omniscience.

original: dpral ba mgrin pa'i 'khor lo dang / snying ga lte bar rim ji bzhin //
analyzed: dpral ba mgrin pa'i 'khor lo dang / snying ga lte bar rim ji bzhin //
translated: In the forehead, throat, heart, and navel cakras,

original: 'di ni brgyal dang 'di bzhin bcings //
analyzed: 'di ni brgyal dang 'di bzhin bcings //
translated: in order, this is fainting, binding,

original: bsad dang bsregs pa'o mi rnams kyi //
analyzed: bsad dang bsregs pa'o mi rnams kyi //
translated: killing, and burning of humans.

original: srog dang thur sel 'gog pa yis //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel 'gog pa yis //
translated: By stopping the life-force and downward-voiding vāyus,

original: 'dod chags bral pa nyid du 'dod //🔽de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid du ni //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral pa nyid du 'dod // de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid du ni //
translated: one is said to be free of desire.🔽Likewise, by burning the two,

original: gnyis bsregs pa yis sngags mkhan 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis bsregs pa yis sngags mkhan 'gyur //
translated: the mantrin becomes a buddha.

original: srog dang thur sel zad kho nas //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel zad kho nas //
translated: By the exhaustion of the life-force and downward-voiding vāyus,

original: yan lag bcu gnyis zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis zad par 'gyur //
translated: the twelve branches are exhausted.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'gog pa yis //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'gog pa yis //
translated: By stopping cause and effect,

original: sangs rgyas mi 'gyur su zhig yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mi 'gyur su zhig yin //
translated: Who would not become a Buddha?

original: zhes so // rlung bkag pa na ni gtum mo rang bzhin gyis 'bar te /
analyzed: zhes so // rlung bkag pa na ni gtum mo rang bzhin gyis 'bar te /
translated: When the winds are blocked, the fierce fire blazes by nature.

original: zla ba des gdungs pa yang 'dzag go //
analyzed: zla ba des gdungs pa yang 'dzag go //
translated: The moon, tormented by that, drips.

original: de las bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: From that, the nature of great bliss, the perfect mandala, becomes manifest.

original: byang chub sems kyang mi g-yo zhing //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyang mi g-yo zhing //
translated: The bodhicitta also does not move,🔽and not abiding in existence or nirvana, it is accumulated in the emanation wheel and so forth.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams su nye bar bsags pa phul du byung ba mchog dang rab mchog la sogs pa'i rim gyis dpral ba nas rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug pa bar ma chad
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams su nye bar bsags pa phul du byung ba mchog dang rab mchog la sogs pa'i rim gyis dpral ba nas rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug pa bar ma chad
translated: The supreme, the most excellent, and so forth, in stages, from the forehead to the end of the vajra jewel,

original: pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa /
analyzed: pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa /
translated: without interruption, is the indivisibility of emptiness and compassion.

original: rim gyis 'phel ba nye bar bgrod cing bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis su khyab par byed do //
analyzed: rim gyis 'phel ba nye bar bgrod cing bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis su khyab par byed do //
translated: It gradually increases, approaches, and pervades the thirty-two channels of the great bliss wheel.

original: de las gzhan rnams te /
analyzed: de las gzhan rnams te /
translated: From that, the others

original: ji srid rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyi bar ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ji srid rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyi bar ro zhes pa ste /
translated: up to the seventy-two thousand channels.

original: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pas rnams gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du mi 'dod //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pas rnams gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du mi 'dod //
translated: Because the stages of the path of the perfection vehicle are made clear, it is not asserted to be the stage of Vajradhara.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje bzlas pa sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje bzlas pa sngar bshad zin to //
translated: In the stage of generation, the repetition of the vajra is explained previously by the yoga of the great mandala.🔽However,

original: 'on kyang // sgom pa yi ni bar chad can //
analyzed: 'on kyang // sgom pa yi ni bar chad can //
translated: those who have obstacles to meditation

original: rnal 'byor phyi rol bzlas pa spang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor phyi rol bzlas pa spang //
translated: abandon the external yoga repetition.

original: sngags don bcom ldan rdo rje can //
analyzed: sngags don bcom ldan rdo rje can //
translated: The meaning of the mantra is the Bhagavān Vajrī.

original: rdo rje'i @203b bdag nyid ci ltar bzlas /
analyzed: rdo rje'i @203b bdag nyid ci ltar bzlas /
translated: How is the repetition of the vajra nature?

original: she na / gang rnams bzlas pa 'di mi nus pa'i sngags pa byis pa'i blo can te /
analyzed: she na / gang rnams bzlas pa 'di mi nus pa'i sngags pa byis pa'i blo can te /
translated: Those who are unable to do this repetition are the mantra practitioners with the mind of a child.

original: de rnams kho na bgrang phreng gis //
analyzed: de rnams kho na bgrang phreng gis //
translated: For them alone,

original: rab tu brjod pa rab bstan te //
analyzed: rab tu brjod pa rab bstan te //
translated: the rosary is taught.

original: sngags pa bsod nams thob byed du //
analyzed: sngags pa bsod nams thob byed du //
translated: For the sake of the mantra practitioner obtaining merit,

original: phyi'i ngag mngon par 'dod rnams la'o //
analyzed: phyi'i ngag mngon par 'dod rnams la'o //
translated: the external speech is taught.

original: de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa la yang sems kyi rang bzhin rnams nges par byas te //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa la yang sems kyi rang bzhin rnams nges par byas te //
translated: Thus, having ascertained the natures of the mind in vajra repetition as well,

original: ji ltar rigs par spangs shing blangs nas shin tu goms pa las rlung 'gags pa na sngar bzhin du yon tan rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par spangs shing blangs nas shin tu goms pa las rlung 'gags pa na sngar bzhin du yon tan rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: and having abandoned and taken up as appropriate, the qualities arise as before when the winds are arrested through thorough familiarity.

original: nye bar sdud pa //
analyzed: nye bar sdud pa //
translated: The Summary

original: 'di skad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is the statement beginning with “Thus, having abandoned the mind’s nature of the three realms. . . .”

original: bde ba chen po'i khyad par gyis ni 'di ltar goms pa'i phyir bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub pa zhes gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i khyad par gyis ni 'di ltar goms pa'i phyir bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub pa zhes gsal bar byed do //
translated: The distinctive feature of great bliss is that it is thus familiarized, and so it is made clear that the nature of great bliss, the vajra holder, is accomplished.

original: bsam gtan la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsol ba 'debs pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsol ba 'debs pa /
translated: In order to teach concentration and so forth in detail, [the bodhisattvas] request:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, the bodhisattvas, having bowed to the Lord of the World,🔽said this to the Teacher, the Lord of the Dharma:

original: khyod kyi ni nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi ni nyid kyi'o //
translated: “Your, that is, your own,

original: ci ltar te bya ba'i khyad par ci la brten nas mi phyed ma la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams 'byung //
analyzed: ci ltar te bya ba'i khyad par ci la brten nas mi phyed ma la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams 'byung //
translated: what? What is the distinctive activity that is the basis for the arising of the channels such as the indestructible and so on?

original: de rnams kyi rtsa de rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rtsa de rnams kyi'o //
translated: Those are the channels of those, that is, of the indestructible and so on.

original: de rnams la pu lli ra la sogs pa'i gnas ji skad bcu bdun par gsungs pa dang / de bzhin 'khor lo dgod pa dang gzhan sa la sogs pa'i rnam ba ji ltar lags //
analyzed: de rnams la pu lli ra la sogs pa'i gnas ji skad bcu bdun par gsungs pa dang / de bzhin 'khor lo dgod pa dang gzhan sa la sogs pa'i rnam ba ji ltar lags //
translated: Likewise, how are the wheels and other aspects arranged on the earth, etc.?

original: gsang ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa la gsal bar mi bya ba'i phyir phyi'i gnas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa la gsal bar mi bya ba'i phyir phyi'i gnas la sogs pa'o //
translated: The secret is the external places, etc., because they are not to be revealed to śrāvakas, etc.

original: shin tu gsang ba ni de lha'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lor ro //
analyzed: shin tu gsang ba ni de lha'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lor ro //
translated: The very secret is the wheel of the deity’s maṇḍala.

original: mchog ni ches gsang ba ste lus la'o //
analyzed: mchog ni ches gsang ba ste lus la'o //
translated: The supreme is the very secret, which is in the body.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rtsa'i ngo bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gnas la sogs pa rnams dang sa bcu rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams te /
analyzed: rtsa'i ngo bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gnas la sogs pa rnams dang sa bcu rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams te /
translated: The essence of the nāḍīs is the ḍākinīs, the places, etc., the ten stages, and the ten perfections.

original: de rnams kyi kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir bcu bdun par gsungs par gyur pa ste //
analyzed: de rnams kyi kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir bcu bdun par gsungs par gyur pa ste //
translated: Their twenty-four real natures are taught in the Twenty-One Thousand.

original: 'dir ni rab tu rnam par phye nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni rab tu rnam par phye nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: Here they will be explained in detail.

original: dang por rten nyid kyi phyir mgo zhes pa la sogs pas dri ba bzhi pa'i lan gyis so //
analyzed: dang por rten nyid kyi phyir mgo zhes pa la sogs pas dri ba bzhi pa'i lan gyis so //
translated: First, because it is the support, the reply to the fourth question is stated with “the head,” etc.

original: rgyab kyi stod ni rgyab kyi dbus las steng gi sgal tshigs kyi steng gi cha ste /
analyzed: rgyab kyi stod ni rgyab kyi dbus las steng gi sgal tshigs kyi steng gi cha ste /
translated: The upper back is the part above the middle of the back, above the spine.

original: mgo bo'i rgyab ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: mgo bo'i rgyab ces pa'i don to //
translated: It means the back of the head.

original: smin ma mig dag dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: smin ma mig dag dbus gnas pa //
translated: The middle of the eyebrows and eyes

original: zhes pa smin ma dag gi dang mig dag gi dbus na gnas pa'i cha'o //
analyzed: zhes pa smin ma dag gi dang mig dag gi dbus na gnas pa'i cha'o //
translated: is the part in the middle of the eyebrows and the middle of the eyes.

original: @204a * // mig dag gi zhes pa mig gnyis ni de w'i ko ta'o //
analyzed: @204a * // mig dag gi zhes pa mig gnyis ni de w'i ko ta'o //
translated: The two eyes are Devīkoṭa.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lor zhes pa mgo bo la sogs pa rnams dang ma la ya la sogs pa nang dang phyi'i yul rnams sems kyi rang gi ngo bor tha snyad byas so //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lor zhes pa mgo bo la sogs pa rnams dang ma la ya la sogs pa nang dang phyi'i yul rnams sems kyi rang gi ngo bor tha snyad byas so //
translated: The mind wheel is the head and so forth, and Malaya and so forth, the inner and outer places, which are conventionally designated as the essence of the mind.

original: nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa sems te rab tu grags pa'i nam mkha' yang ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa sems te rab tu grags pa'i nam mkha' yang ngo //
translated: Space is the mind, which is of one taste with emptiness, and it is also the well-known space.

original: gzhan gyi don du de la spyod pa'i ngang tshul can mtho ris su son pa'i rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don du de la spyod pa'i ngang tshul can mtho ris su son pa'i rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi'o //
translated: The vajra goddesses are those who have the nature of enjoying that space for the benefit of others and who have attained the higher realms.

original: chu so ni sa bon gyi sbubs gnyis so //
analyzed: chu so ni sa bon gyi sbubs gnyis so //
translated: The urinary tract is the two seed-sheaths.

original: yul rnams thams cad ni k'a ma r'u pa la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: yul rnams thams cad ni k'a ma r'u pa la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: The countries are Kāmarūpa and so forth,

original: mchan khung la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: mchan khung la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: and the armpits and so forth.

original: sa ni sa gzhi ste ngag gi tha snyad kyi rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sa ni sa gzhi ste ngag gi tha snyad kyi rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The earth is the ground, because it is the basis of verbal conventions.

original: de la spyod pa mi yul ma rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de la spyod pa mi yul ma rnams kyi'o //
translated: The conduct is that of the human countries.

original: rtags ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rtags ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The sign is the vajra.

original: sor mo zhes pa rkang pa la sogs pa'i sor mo rnams so //
analyzed: sor mo zhes pa rkang pa la sogs pa'i sor mo rnams so //
translated: The fingers are the fingers of the feet and so forth.

original: mthe bong ni rkang pa la sogs pa'i mthe bong gnyis so //
analyzed: mthe bong ni rkang pa la sogs pa'i mthe bong gnyis so //
translated: The thumbs are the two thumbs of the feet and so forth.

original: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ni sku'i 'khor lo la rnam par gnas pa rnams kyis te sa 'og la spyod ma rnams kyis brjod cing bdag nyid bde bar bya ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ni sku'i 'khor lo la rnam par gnas pa rnams kyis te sa 'og la spyod ma rnams kyis brjod cing bdag nyid bde bar bya ste /
translated: The dakinis, who abide in the body cakra, who are the conductresses of the underworld, speak and make themselves happy.

original: khyab ces pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: khyab ces pa'i bar ro //
translated: Up to pervading.

original: yul rnams zhes pa ma la ya la sogs pa 'dzam bu gling dang 'brel ba rnams te /
analyzed: yul rnams zhes pa ma la ya la sogs pa 'dzam bu gling dang 'brel ba rnams te /
translated: The countries are Malaya and so forth, which are connected to Jambudvipa.

original: 'di ni las kyis yin rtsi gling cig shos rnams ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: 'di ni las kyis yin rtsi gling cig shos rnams ni ma yin no ;
translated: This is by action, not by the other continents.

original: / gser gling ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang du gtogs so //
analyzed: / gser gling ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang du gtogs so //
translated: The continent of gold is included in Jambudvipa.

original: las kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi dngos grub rnams so zhes pas rnal 'byor ma rnams phal cher gzhan du rgyu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: las kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi dngos grub rnams so zhes pas rnal 'byor ma rnams phal cher gzhan du rgyu ba ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the yoginīs do not move elsewhere for the most part.

original: rang gi lus skyes zhes pa /
analyzed: rang gi lus skyes zhes pa /
translated: “Born from one’s own body”

original: gang gi phyir sems can so so la rang gi lus 'dzam bu gling yin pa de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems can so so la rang gi lus 'dzam bu gling yin pa de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: means that since each individual sentient being has their own body, which is the continent of Jambūdvīpa,

original: rang nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid ces pa'o //
translated: it is said, “one’s own.”

original: rang dang 'dra ba'i phyi rol ni rang nyid phyi rol te 'dzam bu gling ngo //
analyzed: rang dang 'dra ba'i phyi rol ni rang nyid phyi rol te 'dzam bu gling ngo //
translated: The external that is similar to oneself is the external, which is Jambūdvīpa.

original: nang yang ste lus kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: nang yang ste lus kyi bdag nyid de /
translated: The internal is the body itself.

original: de la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de la gnas pa ste /
translated: One should abide in that.

original: rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'gro ba'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'gro ba'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the world is merely the appearance of one’s own mind, which is illusory by nature.

original: 'di nyid kyi phyir 'di rnams su ste rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo gsum du rnam par gzhag pa rnams su rdo rje lha mo rnams bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi phyir 'di rnams su ste rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo gsum du rnam par gzhag pa rnams su rdo rje lha mo rnams bzhugs pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, the vajra goddesses reside in these three natural maṇḍalas, which are the three maṇḍalas.

original: rtsa'i gzugs kyis zhes gsungs pa ni dri ba lnga pa'i lan te /
analyzed: rtsa'i gzugs kyis zhes gsungs pa ni dri ba lnga pa'i lan te /
translated: The response to the fifth question is “in the form of nāḍīs.”

original: rtsa'i ngo bo rnams kyang lha mo ste phyag la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa lha mo'i gzugs @204b rnams kyang rtsa'o zhes khyad par med pa rtog par byed pa lhur len pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa'i ngo bo rnams kyang lha mo ste phyag la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa lha mo'i gzugs @204b rnams kyang rtsa'o zhes khyad par med pa rtog par byed pa lhur len pa'o //
translated: The essence of the channels is also goddesses, and the goddesses' forms are also channels, having hands and so forth.

original: sa rnams pha tol tu phyin pa rnams ni /
analyzed: sa rnams pha tol tu phyin pa rnams ni /
translated: The stages are the perfections.

original: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
analyzed: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
translated: The stages are the grounds, beginning with the Joyful.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa bcu bdun par gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brang bas ma la ya la sogs pa rnams la rnam par gzhag pa go sla'o zhes pas 'dir rgyas par ma bstan to zhes pa'o //🔽dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa bcu bdun par gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brang bas ma la ya la sogs pa rnams la rnam par gzhag pa go sla'o zhes pas 'dir rgyas par ma bstan to zhes pa'o // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: Following the statement of the seventeen grounds, it is easy to understand the presentation of Malaya and so forth, so it is not taught here in detail.

original: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu gcig pa'o /
analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu gcig pa'o /
translated: This is the twenty-first flower in the garland of instructions in the commentary on the glorious Heruka's Tantra.

original: // / dang po'i brten pa dri ba gnyis kyi lan mdor bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / dang po'i brten pa dri ba gnyis kyi lan mdor bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: The reply to the two questions about the first reliance is stated in brief:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then and so forth.

original: gang yang rung ba'i zhes pa sems can so so'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i zhes pa sems can so so'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The meaning is that the bodies of individual sentient beings are the nature of the Tathāgata.

original: de la gcig gi lus gang 'dra bar rnam par 'jog pa de 'dra bar gzhan gyi yang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la gcig gi lus gang 'dra bar rnam par 'jog pa de 'dra bar gzhan gyi yang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that just as one body is posited, so are the others.

original: de'i ni padma'o //
analyzed: de'i ni padma'o //
translated: That is the lotus.

original: rtsa ni aa wa dh'u ti'o //
analyzed: rtsa ni aa wa dh'u ti'o //
translated: The channel is the avadhūtī.

original: til mar mar me'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: til mar mar me'i rang bzhin can //
translated: The nature of the lamp of the oil-lamp.

original: til mar dang ldan pa'i me sgron ma ste /
analyzed: til mar dang ldan pa'i me sgron ma ste /
translated: The lamp of the oil-lamp is endowed with oil.

original: de dang 'dra bar 'od zer gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar 'od zer gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: The meaning is that it is similar to that, because it is the nature of light rays.

original: gtum mo 'bar ba'i dus na'o //🔽cung zad dbye ba'i kha can nyid kyis na chu shing gi me tog lta bu'o //
analyzed: gtum mo 'bar ba'i dus na'o // cung zad dbye ba'i kha can nyid kyis na chu shing gi me tog lta bu'o //
translated: At the time of the blazing of caṇḍālī.🔽The meaning is that it is like the flower of the plantain tree, because it is slightly open.

original: kha ni 'di'i padma'i mdung ba'i nang du son pa'i chal ltos pas rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: kha ni 'di'i padma'i mdung ba'i nang du son pa'i chal ltos pas rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The mouth is posited as the opening of the lotus, which is inside the mouth.

original: de'i ni kha'i 'o //
analyzed: de'i ni kha'i 'o //
translated: That is the mouth.

original: dpa' bo ni mi mthun pa'i rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir he ru ka ste /
analyzed: dpa' bo ni mi mthun pa'i rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir he ru ka ste /
translated: The hero is Heruka, because he conquers the discordant concepts.

original: lha nyid sngags kyi tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: lha nyid sngags kyi tshul gyis ni //
translated: The deity is the mantra system.

original: dngos grub thams cad ster bar mdzad //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ster bar mdzad //
translated: It bestows all powers.

original: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mi shigs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mi shigs pa ste /
translated: And for that very reason, it is indestructible,

original: mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i ched du gzhom du med pa'i nus pa can no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i ched du gzhom du med pa'i nus pa can no //
translated: since it is the invincible power for the sake of accomplishing the desired goal.

original: sa bon ni gtum mo'i bde ba 'byung ba'i 'o //
analyzed: sa bon ni gtum mo'i bde ba 'byung ba'i 'o //
translated: The seed is the source of the bliss of the fierce fire.

original: kha ba 'dzag pa ni bsil ba'i 'od can te /
analyzed: kha ba 'dzag pa ni bsil ba'i 'od can te /
translated: The dripping snow is the cool-rayed moon,

original: de dang mnyam par bdud rtsi'i 'od 'dzag pa nyid kyis dang dga' bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de dang mnyam par bdud rtsi'i 'od 'dzag pa nyid kyis dang dga' bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
translated: since it is the dripping light of nectar, and it delights by its very nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na bde ba'i dga' ston 'bar bar byed pa'i phyir dpyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na bde ba'i dga' ston 'bar bar byed pa'i phyir dpyid do //
translated: And for that very reason, it is spring, since it causes the blazing festival of bliss.

original: rtag tu goms bzhin pa ni bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir dga' byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu goms bzhin pa ni bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir dga' byed pa'o //
translated: It is the delight, since it is the continuum of the perfection of bliss, always in practice.

original: rgod mkha'i me yi gzugs //
analyzed: rgod mkha'i me yi gzugs //
translated: The form of the mare's fire.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is said:🔽Just as the mare's fire consumes the water of the entire ocean, etc.,

original: ji ltar rgod mkha'i me rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i chu la sogs pa kham du byed pa de ltar 'di phung @205a * //
analyzed: ji ltar rgod mkha'i me rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i chu la sogs pa kham du byed pa de ltar 'di phung @205a * //
translated: in mouthfuls, so does this one, the fire of passion, consume the entire body of the elements, etc.,

original: po la sogs pa'i bud shing ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: po la sogs pa'i bud shing ma lus pa'o //
translated: All the fuel, such as wood, etc.

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma kho na bdag med nyid de rang bzhin med pa spros pa mtha' dag las ldog pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma kho na bdag med nyid de rang bzhin med pa spros pa mtha' dag las ldog pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Since the Blessed Lady, Nairātmya, is the very nature of selflessness, of essencelessness, the essence of the cessation of all conceptual elaborations,

original: de ltar gyur pa ni ti la ka ste thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa ni ti la ka ste thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: she is the tilaka, the essence of great compassion.

original: ti la dga' bar byed pa la'o //
analyzed: ti la dga' bar byed pa la'o //
translated: Ti means “to delight.”

original: ti la ti ste dga' bar byed de /
analyzed: ti la ti ste dga' bar byed de /
translated: Ti la means “to delight,”

original: dbang phyug mchog nyid ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: dbang phyug mchog nyid ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes byas nas so //
translated: because she possesses the supreme power.

original: ae yig aa yig tu 'gyur ba ni gtsug lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ae yig aa yig tu 'gyur ba ni gtsug lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The e vowel becomes the a vowel because of the sacredness.

original: las ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i sems kyi bya ba ste /
analyzed: las ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i sems kyi bya ba ste /
translated: Karma is the activity of the mind that arises from meditation.

original: des bskul ba lte ba'i 'og gi rlung ngo //
analyzed: des bskul ba lte ba'i 'og gi rlung ngo //
translated: It is the wind below the navel, which is stimulated by that.

original: des bskyod pa ni rab tu rgyas par byas pa'o //
analyzed: des bskyod pa ni rab tu rgyas par byas pa'o //
translated: It is shaken, that is, expanded, by that.

original: tshim pa ni dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshim pa ni dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is satisfied, because it produces delight.

original: snyoms par zhugs pa ni 'khyud pas so //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa ni 'khyud pas so //
translated: It is absorbed, because of the embrace.

original: ba san ta yang yin la de kho na nyid til ka yang yin pas dpyid kyi thig le'o //🔽gang gi phyir rnal 'byor ma'i ste til ka'i rang gi ngo bo bdag nyid la dbyer med par bzung nas gnas te /🔽rgyu ba yang dag rgyu'i rlung dang mi rgyu ba gnas pa ste de la'o //
analyzed: ba san ta yang yin la de kho na nyid til ka yang yin pas dpyid kyi thig le'o // gang gi phyir rnal 'byor ma'i ste til ka'i rang gi ngo bo bdag nyid la dbyer med par bzung nas gnas te / rgyu ba yang dag rgyu'i rlung dang mi rgyu ba gnas pa ste de la'o //
translated: Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rlung /🔽sgo rnams gsum gyis 'byung bas na /🔽'byung ba ni 'jug ba nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rlung / sgo rnams gsum gyis 'byung bas na / 'byung ba ni 'jug ba nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.

original: 'gro'o 'ong ngo rnam par gnas so //🔽de ltar mdor bstan nas kyang /
analyzed: 'gro'o 'ong ngo rnam par gnas so // de ltar mdor bstan nas kyang /
translated: Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.

original: dpyid kyi thig le /🔽lte bar zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par ston to //
analyzed: dpyid kyi thig le / lte bar zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par ston to //
translated: Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.

original: aa yig gzugs kyis zhes pa aa yig ti la ka'o //🔽de ni thung ngu ste phyi mo gcig pa'o //
analyzed: aa yig gzugs kyis zhes pa aa yig ti la ka'o // de ni thung ngu ste phyi mo gcig pa'o //
translated: Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.

original: thig le zhes pa ni phra mo'o //🔽'dir phyi mo gcig pa la sogs pas nang gi brjod pa'i dus gsal bar byas kyi /
analyzed: thig le zhes pa ni phra mo'o //🔽'dir phyi mo gcig pa la sogs pas nang gi brjod pa'i dus gsal bar byas kyi /
translated: Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.🔽Since it is the bindu of spring, it is the essence of the tillika.

original: brjod pa'i dus ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: brjod pa'i dus ni ma yin gyi /
translated: not the time for expression.

original: de gtum mo sgom pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gtum mo sgom pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is absent in the meditation on the fierce fire.

original: a'a: h'um aom ham /
analyzed: a'a: h'um aom ham /
translated: A HŪṂ OṂ HAṂ

original: bris pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa'i yang ste 'dir rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i thabs nyid rtogs pa'i dgongs pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i skabs su rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: bris pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa'i yang ste 'dir rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i thabs nyid rtogs pa'i dgongs pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i skabs su rgyas par bshad do //
translated: The written is also the meditation on the creation stage. Here, the intention is to understand the method of entering the completion stage itself, which is explained extensively in the section on the completion stage.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la aa yig ni phra mo thung ngu rdul gyi ri mo drang ba'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la aa yig ni phra mo thung ngu rdul gyi ri mo drang ba'i ngo bo ste /
translated: In the completion stage, the letter A is the essence of the short, subtle, straight line of dust,

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa las tha mi dad pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa las tha mi dad pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: the nature of the experience of the mind of enlightenment, which is not different from the non-arising of all phenomena.

original: de skad du yang gsungs pa /🔽ga bur nyid ni bdag med @205b ma ;
analyzed: de skad du yang gsungs pa / ga bur nyid ni bdag med @205b ma ;
translated: Thus it is said:🔽Camphor is selfless,

original: / bde ba bdag med tshul can no //
analyzed: / bde ba bdag med tshul can no //
translated: having the nature of selfless bliss.

original: de yi bde ba phyag rgya che //
analyzed: de yi bde ba phyag rgya che //
translated: Its bliss is the great seal,

original: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
translated: abiding in the mandala of the navel.

original: dang po'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: dang po'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of the first vowel,

original: blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
analyzed: blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
translated: is designated as the mind by the Buddhas.

original: de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma //
translated: That is the Bhagavatī Prajñā.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las //
translated: From the yoga of the completion stage,

original: zhes so // de yi bde ba 'dod mar bshad //
analyzed: zhes so // de yi bde ba 'dod mar bshad //
translated: That bliss is said to be Rati.

original: ces pas ga bur las tha mi dad pa bde ba'o //
analyzed: ces pas ga bur las tha mi dad pa bde ba'o //
translated: This says that bliss is not different from camphor.

original: de'i ste ga bur gyi shes rab bdag med ma ni lte bar gnas pa'i shes rab bdag med ma ste /
analyzed: de'i ste ga bur gyi shes rab bdag med ma ni lte bar gnas pa'i shes rab bdag med ma ste /
translated: Her, that is, the Prajñā of camphor, Nairātmya, is the Nairātmya who abides at the navel.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa kho na la ni bdag med ma phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / yi ge'i gzugs kyang ngo //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa kho na la ni bdag med ma phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / yi ge'i gzugs kyang ngo //
translated: In the creation stage alone, Nairātmya has arms and so forth and the form of a syllable.

original: don dam par ni rim pa gnyis ka la yang /
analyzed: don dam par ni rim pa gnyis ka la yang /
translated: But ultimately, in both stages,

original: de ni ring min thung ba min //
analyzed: de ni ring min thung ba min //
translated: She is not long, not short,

original: gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min //
analyzed: gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min //
translated: Not square, not round,

original: myang dang dri dang ro las 'das //
analyzed: myang dang dri dang ro las 'das //
translated: Beyond taste, smell, and taste,

original: lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa ma'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa ma'o //
translated: The mother who creates the innate joy.

original: de bzhin h'um yig dang aom yig dag sems dang ngag dag rdzogs pa'i rim pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin h'um yig dang aom yig dag sems dang ngag dag rdzogs pa'i rim pa la'o //
translated: Likewise, the syllables hūṃ and oṃ are for the mind and speech in the completion stage.

original: ham yig ni ham gi dbyibs can gyi rtsa dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems kho na'o //
analyzed: ham yig ni ham gi dbyibs can gyi rtsa dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems kho na'o //
translated: The syllable haṃ is the bodhicitta alone, which is connected to the nāḍī in the shape of a ha.

original: de nyid phyir yi ge sgom pa ni zhar la byung ba nyid du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnam par gzhag pas gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: de nyid phyir yi ge sgom pa ni zhar la byung ba nyid du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnam par gzhag pas gsal bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, the meditation on the seed syllable is clarified by the presentation of the perfection stage as a secondary matter.

original: sa sogs zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: sa sogs zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: The earth, etc., etc.

original: ma zags pa bde ba las tha mi dad pa'i khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: ma zags pa bde ba las tha mi dad pa'i khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The unfallen bodhicitta, which is the form of the bodhicitta that is not different from bliss, is the Bhagavān.🔽 Since it is not different from speech, mind, and the particles, it is the earth, water, fire, and wind, respectively.

original: ngag dang sems dang rdul rnams dang tha mi dad pas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi rim pa ji lta bar sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo rnams su khyad par can nyid las rol par byed do zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: ngag dang sems dang rdul rnams dang tha mi dad pas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi rim pa ji lta bar sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo rnams su khyad par can nyid las rol par byed do zhes 'brel lo //
translated: It is the play in the wheels of emanation, etc., due to its special nature.🔽 The unfallen bodhicitta is to be expanded in the navel, etc., because the earth, etc., increase in that order.

original: ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni lte ba la sogs pa rnams su rim pa ji lta bar sa la sogs pa 'phel ba'i phyir nye bar rgyas par bya ba'o zhes bdag gis drug pa dang nyi shu rtsa gcig par bshad zin to //🔽de lta kho nar 'phel ba la dgongs nas bzhi par /
analyzed: ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni lte ba la sogs pa rnams su rim pa ji lta bar sa la sogs pa 'phel ba'i phyir nye bar rgyas par bya ba'o zhes bdag gis drug pa dang nyi shu rtsa gcig par bshad zin to //🔽de lta kho nar 'phel ba la dgongs nas bzhi par /
translated: This is what I explained in the sixth and twenty-first chapters.

original: ae yig sa ru shes par bya //
analyzed: ae yig sa ru shes par bya //
translated: The letter E is to be known as the earth.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa sprul pa la sogs pa rnams su gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa sprul pa la sogs pa rnams su gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is taught that the four are emanation and so forth.

original: thun mtshams bzhi zhes pa la /
analyzed: thun mtshams bzhi zhes pa la /
translated: The four junctures are

original: mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bdag nyid zla ba dang nyi ma dag gtum mo 'bar bas 'dus pa dag gis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis dang stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis dbye ba mi dmigs @206a * //
analyzed: mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bdag nyid zla ba dang nyi ma dag gtum mo 'bar bas 'dus pa dag gis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis dang stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis dbye ba mi dmigs @206a * //
translated: the moon and sun, which have the nature of night and day, by the blazing of fierce fire, by the non-apprehension of distinction through the nature of innate bliss and the single taste of emptiness,

original: pa ni mtshams te /
analyzed: pa ni mtshams te /
translated: and by the juncture.

original: yang dag pa'i bsam gtan ni mtshams ting nge 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa zhes pa'i don gyi mthar thug pas so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i bsam gtan ni mtshams ting nge 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa zhes pa'i don gyi mthar thug pas so //
translated: The juncture is the limit of the meaning of the non-conceptual samādhi, which is true meditative concentration.

original: de'i 'char ba ni nor bu nas brtsams nas lte bar ji srid par te /
analyzed: de'i 'char ba ni nor bu nas brtsams nas lte bar ji srid par te /
translated: Its arising is from the jewel up to the navel.

original: ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'phel bzhin pa ni steng du nye bar 'gro /
analyzed: ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'phel bzhin pa ni steng du nye bar 'gro /
translated: The unmoving bodhicitta increases and moves upward.

original: bde zhing stong pa nyid kyi ye shes phul du byung ba 'gugs par byed /
analyzed: bde zhing stong pa nyid kyi ye shes phul du byung ba 'gugs par byed /
translated: It attracts the supreme bliss and the wisdom of emptiness.

original: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po'i rim pas sprul pa la sogs pa'i padma rnams su'o //
analyzed: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po'i rim pas sprul pa la sogs pa'i padma rnams su'o //
translated: In the sequence of small, medium, great, and greater than great, in the lotuses of emanation, and so forth.

original: de ltar yang 'di rnams su rgyu mthun pa dang rnam par smin pa dang skyes bu byed pa dang / dri ma med pa nyid rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das yang dag par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar yang 'di rnams su rgyu mthun pa dang rnam par smin pa dang skyes bu byed pa dang / dri ma med pa nyid rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das yang dag par 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus, the Bhagavān arises in these as natural outflow, as karmic maturation, as the activity of beings, and as the stainless.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: padma bzhi ru yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: padma bzhi ru yang dag 'byung //
translated: The Bhagavān arises in four lotuses.

original: zhes so // de skad du yang phyag rgya chen po thig ler gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // de skad du yang phyag rgya chen po thig ler gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is said in the Drop of the Great Seal:

original: mtshan mo shes rab ces par bshad //
analyzed: mtshan mo shes rab ces par bshad //
translated: Night is explained as wisdom.

original: mtshan mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur //
translated: The part of night is the moon.

original: nyin mo thabs su bshad pa ste //
analyzed: nyin mo thabs su bshad pa ste //
translated: Day is explained as method.

original: thabs ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur //
analyzed: thabs ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur //
translated: Method is the sun.

original: de yang gnyis med tshul du brjod //
analyzed: de yang gnyis med tshul du brjod //
translated: That is also said to be nondual.

original: zla ba'i skye ba nyi ma las //
analyzed: zla ba'i skye ba nyi ma las //
translated: The arising of the moon is from the sun.

original: 'od gsal nyid phyir nyi mar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od gsal nyid phyir nyi mar 'gyur //
translated: Because of the clarity of light, there is the sun.

original: rtog pa dam pa'i don du ste //
analyzed: rtog pa dam pa'i don du ste //
translated: The supreme meaning is the concept.

original: mchog tu bde ba cha med pa //
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba cha med pa //
translated: The supreme bliss is partless.

original: mi snang stong pa'i lus can te //
analyzed: mi snang stong pa'i lus can te //
translated: The body is empty, invisible,

original: 'od gsal go 'phong zhi ba ste //
analyzed: 'od gsal go 'phong zhi ba ste //
translated: the state of clear light, peaceful,

original: kha cig tu ni yang dag bzhugs //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni yang dag bzhugs //
translated: and abides in some places.

original: de nas gzhan pa mtshams bshad de //
analyzed: de nas gzhan pa mtshams bshad de //
translated: Then, the other junction is explained:

original: mun dang mun min gnyis ka spangs //
analyzed: mun dang mun min gnyis ka spangs //
translated: Darkness and non-darkness are both abandoned,

original: 'dus pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas //
analyzed: 'dus pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas //
translated: abiding in the middle of the two assemblies.

original: zhen pa gos pa rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: zhen pa gos pa rnam spangs pa //
translated: Attachment and stains are completely abandoned,

original: rdo rje padma'i bdud rtsi byung //
analyzed: rdo rje padma'i bdud rtsi byung //
translated: the nectar of the vajra and lotus arises,

original: zla ba nyi ma yang dag ldan //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma yang dag ldan //
translated: endowed with the sun and moon,

original: gang zhig mtha' nyid yang dag 'dren //
analyzed: gang zhig mtha' nyid yang dag 'dren //
translated: that which truly leads to the end,

original: de ni mtshams te srid pa sbyor //
analyzed: de ni mtshams te srid pa sbyor //
translated: that is the junction, the connection to existence,

original: mchog gi rnam pa'i ngo bor bshad //
analyzed: mchog gi rnam pa'i ngo bor bshad //
translated: explained as the nature of the supreme aspect.

original: phra ba'i mig gi mthong mtshan nyid //
analyzed: phra ba'i mig gi mthong mtshan nyid //
translated: The characteristic of seeing with the subtle eye,

original: sems can kun gyi mtshams rnams ni //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi mtshams rnams ni //
translated: the junctions of all sentient beings,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'o //
translated: are the queens of the vajra holder.

original: 'char ba mchog tu grags pa ste //
analyzed: 'char ba mchog tu grags pa ste //
translated: The rising is renowned as supreme,

original: khyad dga' dang po rnam par spangs //
analyzed: khyad dga' dang po rnam par spangs //
translated: the first special joy is abandoned,

original: mdud pa'i rtser gnas mchog tu zhi //
analyzed: mdud pa'i rtser gnas mchog tu zhi //
translated: abiding at the tip of the knot, supremely peaceful,

original: tsa na ka yi 'bru'i ngo bo //
analyzed: tsa na ka yi 'bru'i ngo bo //
translated: the essence of a mustard seed,

original: de nas 'char ba gzings bdag po //
analyzed: de nas 'char ba gzings bdag po //
translated: then the rising is the lord of the ship.

original: gang phyir steng gi go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: gang phyir steng gi go 'phang gnas //
translated: Because it abides in the upper state.

original: la lar thig le'i ngo bo ste //
analyzed: la lar thig le'i ngo bo ste //
translated: In some places, it is the essence of the bindu,

original: rnam pa bzhi po yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi po yang dag gnas //
translated: Correctly abiding in the four aspects.

original: kha @206b cig tu yang thog ma spangs //
analyzed: kha @206b cig tu yang thog ma spangs //
translated: In some places, it is abandoned from the beginning.

original: la lar de yang thob bya min //
analyzed: la lar de yang thob bya min //
translated: In some places, it is not even to be attained.

original: gang phyir rang rig bya bdag nyid //
analyzed: gang phyir rang rig bya bdag nyid //
translated: Because it is the nature of self-awareness,

original: de phyir brjod par bya ba min //
analyzed: de phyir brjod par bya ba min //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be expressed.

original: zhes so // 'dir de yang ni zla ba dang nyi ma 'dres pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir de yang ni zla ba dang nyi ma 'dres pa dag go //
translated: Here, that refers to the moon and sun mixed together.

original: skye ba ni 'phel ba mchog dang chos kyi'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni 'phel ba mchog dang chos kyi'o //
translated: Arising is the supreme increase of the Dharma.

original: rtog pa ni kun rdzob pa 'di thams cad do //
analyzed: rtog pa ni kun rdzob pa 'di thams cad do //
translated: Conceptualization is all of this relative [reality].

original: de nas mi dmigs pa kho na gzhan pa 'jig rten pa ma yin pa gang las mun pa la sogs pa gsum las ldog pa'i ngo bo yin pa ste /
analyzed: de nas mi dmigs pa kho na gzhan pa 'jig rten pa ma yin pa gang las mun pa la sogs pa gsum las ldog pa'i ngo bo yin pa ste /
translated: Then, non-apprehension itself is the other, which is not worldly, the nature of turning away from the three, such as darkness, and so on.

original: snang ba mtshan mo'i cha'o gsal bar nyi ma'i 'od can nyin mo snang ba mched pa yin //
analyzed: snang ba mtshan mo'i cha'o gsal bar nyi ma'i 'od can nyin mo snang ba mched pa yin //
translated: The light of the moon is the appearance of the night. The light of the sun is the increasing appearance of the day.

original: mtshams ni snang ba thob pa rang bzhin rang nyid rnams kyis lan cig min par sbyor ba 'di'o //
analyzed: mtshams ni snang ba thob pa rang bzhin rang nyid rnams kyis lan cig min par sbyor ba 'di'o //
translated: The juncture is the attainment of light, the nature of one's own self, the repeated practice of this.

original: mtshan min mtshams kyang ma yin nyin mor yang ni mi 'gyur gang zhig rang bzhin dang bral ba //
analyzed: mtshan min mtshams kyang ma yin nyin mor yang ni mi 'gyur gang zhig rang bzhin dang bral ba //
translated: That which is neither night nor day, nor even the interval between them, which is free from intrinsic reality,

original: de 'di'i byang chub skad cig rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa rnal 'byor pa nyid rtogs byar 'gyur //
analyzed: de 'di'i byang chub skad cig rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa rnal 'byor pa nyid rtogs byar 'gyur //
translated: that is his enlightenment, the supreme Victor has said, to be realized by the yogi himself.

original: zhes pa 'dis gsal bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis gsal bar byas pa'o //
translated: This is made clear.

original: gnyis 'dus pa ni gtum mo rnam pa gsum las gang yang rung bas la la n'a dang ra sa n'a'i rlung dag aa wa dh'u t'ir te /
analyzed: gnyis 'dus pa ni gtum mo rnam pa gsum las gang yang rung bas la la n'a dang ra sa n'a'i rlung dag aa wa dh'u t'ir te /
translated: The union of the two is the wind of the lalana and rasanā, any of the three kinds of fierce fire, in the avadhūtī,

original: rdul dang khu ba dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: rdul dang khu ba dag kyang ngo //
translated: and also the semen and blood.

original: de'i dbus na gnas pa ni de la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbus na gnas pa ni de la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It abides in the middle of that, because it pervades it.

original: zhen pa ni chags pa'o //
analyzed: zhen pa ni chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment is desire.

original: btsun mo ni gang las de'i bde ba 'dod mar bshad pa dang gang las stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: btsun mo ni gang las de'i bde ba 'dod mar bshad pa dang gang las stong pa nyid do //
translated: The queen is the one from whom he desires that bliss, and the one from whom emptiness arises.

original: mchog ni phul du byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni phul du byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: The supreme is the best, the innate bliss.

original: khyad dga' dang po dag ste dga' ba dang mchog dga' dag ste /
analyzed: khyad dga' dang po dag ste dga' ba dang mchog dga' dag ste /
translated: The first is the special joy, joy and supreme joy.

original: de rnams dang rnam par bral ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang rnam par bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from those.

original: nor bu'i rtsa ba'i mdud pa'i rtse mor gnas pa'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i rtsa ba'i mdud pa'i rtse mor gnas pa'o //
translated: It abides at the tip of the knot at the root of the jewel.

original: la lar ni kun rdzob tu'o //
analyzed: la lar ni kun rdzob tu'o //
translated: In some cases, it is conventional.

original: kha cig tu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba na'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba na'o //
translated: In some cases, it is the experience of nonconceptual bliss.

original: la lar ni don dam par te /
analyzed: la lar ni don dam par te /
translated: In some cases, it is ultimate.

original: de yang ni zla ba yang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang bcas pa yang rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi phyir thob bya min no //
analyzed: de yang ni zla ba yang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang bcas pa yang rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi phyir thob bya min no //
translated: Moreover, the moon, along with the experience of bliss, is not to be attained because it is devoid of intrinsic reality.

original: ji ltar bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnams kyis dga' ba'i rang bzhin du lugs dang mthun pas 'gyur ba de ltar lugs dang mi mthun pas kyang ste /
analyzed: ji ltar bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnams kyis dga' ba'i rang bzhin du lugs dang mthun pas 'gyur ba de ltar lugs dang mi mthun pas kyang ste /
translated: Just as the bodhicitta that does not move into the great-bliss wheel becomes the nature of joy through the forward process by means of the divisions of lesser and so on, so it is also through the reverse process.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang sbyor ba bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang sbyor ba bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Both are the nature of the four unions.

original: de gsungs pa bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽de la lugs dang mthun pas ni bde ba @207a * //
analyzed: de gsungs pa bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽de la lugs dang mthun pas ni bde ba @207a * //
translated: That is stated in “four” and so on.🔽Therein, through the forward process, the bodhicitta that is the nature of the four joys is generated in the four places, the navel, and so on.

original: chen po'i 'khor lo nas bzung nas mgrin pa'i padmar bde ba chung ngu ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: chen po'i 'khor lo nas bzung nas mgrin pa'i padmar bde ba chung ngu ni dga' ba'o //
translated: The small bliss from the great wheel up to the lotus of the throat is joy.

original: de'i 'og nas bzung nas snying ga padmar bde ba bar ma ni mchog dga' ba'o //🔽de'i 'og nas brtsams nas lte ba'i chu skyes su bde ba chen po ni khyad dga'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og nas bzung nas snying ga padmar bde ba bar ma ni mchog dga' ba'o // de'i 'og nas brtsams nas lte ba'i chu skyes su bde ba chen po ni khyad dga'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The medium bliss from there down to the lotus of the heart is supreme joy.🔽The great bliss from there down to the lotus of the navel is the joy of the joy of separation.

original: de'i 'og gsang ba'i mtsho skyes nas bzung nas rdo rje nor bu chen po'i chen po'i bde ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og gsang ba'i mtsho skyes nas bzung nas rdo rje nor bu chen po'i chen po'i bde ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
translated: The great bliss of the great jewel from the secret lake-born lotus down is the innate joy.

original: 'jig rten pa'o //🔽dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so sor chung ngu dang bar ma dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po'i dbye ba kho nas bcu drug go zhes pa cha bcu drug gang ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'o // dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so sor chung ngu dang bar ma dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po'i dbye ba kho nas bcu drug go zhes pa cha bcu drug gang ba'o //
translated: This is the mundane.🔽The sixteen joys and so forth are sixteen parts, just by the divisions of small, medium, great, and greater.

original: nyi ma'i sbyor pa la ltos pas ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye ba rnams kyis cha bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i sbyor pa la ltos pas ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye ba rnams kyis cha bcu gnyis so //
translated: In dependence on the conjunctions of the sun, they are twelve parts by the divisions of small, medium, and great.

original: lugs las bzlog pas kyang lhan cig skyes pa ma 'phos pa de kho na 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa bzhir rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: lugs las bzlog pas kyang lhan cig skyes pa ma 'phos pa de kho na 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa bzhir rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: Also, in the reverse order, that very connate [joy] that does not move is posited as the four types of transcendent [joy].

original: nor bu nas bzung nas lhan cig skyes pa chung ngu'o //
analyzed: nor bu nas bzung nas lhan cig skyes pa chung ngu'o //
translated: Beginning from the jewel, it is the small connate [joy].

original: lte ba nas brtsams nas bar ma'o //
analyzed: lte ba nas brtsams nas bar ma'o //
translated: Beginning from the navel, it is the medium [connate joy].

original: snying gnas bzung nas chen po'o //
analyzed: snying gnas bzung nas chen po'o //
translated: Beginning from the heart, it is the great [connate joy].

original: mgrin pa nas brtsams nas chen po'i chen po'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa nas brtsams nas chen po'i chen po'o //
translated: Beginning from the throat, it is the great of the great [connate joy].

original: chung ngu la sogs pa rnams la slar yang chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye ba bcu drug rnams so zhes pa cha bcu drug rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: chung ngu la sogs pa rnams la slar yang chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye ba bcu drug rnams so zhes pa cha bcu drug rdzogs pa'o //
translated: In the small and so on, there are again sixteen divisions of small and so on.

original: nyi ma'i sbyor ba la ltos pas snga ma bzhin du rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i sbyor ba la ltos pas snga ma bzhin du rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
translated: In dependence on the conjunctions of the sun, there are twelve as before.

original: ji skad du phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad du phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said in the Drop of the Great Seal:

original: ri bong mtshan ma'i cha 'di rnams //
analyzed: ri bong mtshan ma'i cha 'di rnams //
translated: These parts of the rabbit-marked [moon]

original: dga' ba'i thig le bcu drug de //
analyzed: dga' ba'i thig le bcu drug de //
translated: are the sixteen drops of joy.

original: a'a li'i ngo bor shes par bya //
analyzed: a'a li'i ngo bor shes par bya //
translated: One should know them to be the essence of the vowels.

original: 'khor lo bzhi ru rim pa las //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi ru rim pa las //
translated: In the four chakras, in order,

original: ji skad bshad rnams de lta na'ang //
analyzed: ji skad bshad rnams de lta na'ang //
translated: Although it is explained in that way,

original: nyi ma'i bcu gnyis rnams su bshad //
analyzed: nyi ma'i bcu gnyis rnams su bshad //
translated: it is explained in the twelve of the sun.

original: ces so // de ltar dga' ba la sogs pa bzhin dang lhan cig skyes pa chung ngu la sogs pa bzhin du sbyor ba bzhi rnams ni bcu drug rnams te /
analyzed: ces so // de ltar dga' ba la sogs pa bzhin dang lhan cig skyes pa chung ngu la sogs pa bzhin du sbyor ba bzhi rnams ni bcu drug rnams te /
translated: Thus, the four unions are the sixteen, like joy and so forth, and like the lesser innate joy and so forth.

original: lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs las bzlog pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs las bzlog pa la yang ngo //
translated: They are in forward and reverse order.

original: sbyor ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dag gi dang bde ba rdul dang zla ba dang bcas pa dag dang 'char ba dang nub pa dag gi'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dag gi dang bde ba rdul dang zla ba dang bcas pa dag dang 'char ba dang nub pa dag gi'o //
translated: Union is the rising and setting of the sun and moon, and the bliss particles together with the moon.

original: de skad du phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler gsungs pa /
analyzed: de skad du phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said in the Mahāmudrā-tilaka:

original: sor mo bcu gnyis mthar thug par //
analyzed: sor mo bcu gnyis mthar thug par //
translated: The twelve fingers’ ends

original: skud pa mdud med mtshan @207b nyid can //🔽bde chen chu skyes lte ba nas //
analyzed: skud pa mdud med mtshan @207b nyid can // bde chen chu skyes lte ba nas //
translated: are characterized by the absence of knots.🔽From the center of the great bliss lotus

original: ji srid mgrin pa'i thod pa'i bar //
analyzed: ji srid mgrin pa'i thod pa'i bar //
translated: up to the throat cakra,

original: de las pha rol 'dud par ldan //
analyzed: de las pha rol 'dud par ldan //
translated: beyond that is the bowing,

original: rlung gi mthar thug pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rlung gi mthar thug pa yang ngo //
translated: and the end of the wind.

original: mgrin pa'i rgyab nas mtha' ji srid //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i rgyab nas mtha' ji srid //
translated: From the back of the throat up to the end,

original: de srid sbyor ba bzhi yin no //
analyzed: de srid sbyor ba bzhi yin no //
translated: As long as that, fourfold union.

original: mtha' yi gnas nas snying ga'i phyogs //
analyzed: mtha' yi gnas nas snying ga'i phyogs //
translated: From the end of the uvula to the heart center,

original: de srid gnyis par rab brjod do //
analyzed: de srid gnyis par rab brjod do //
translated: as long as that, the second is well known.

original: snying ga'i phyogs nas lte rtsa ba //
analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs nas lte rtsa ba //
translated: From the heart center to the navel,

original: de srid gsum par rab brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de srid gsum par rab brjod pa'o //
translated: as long as that, the third is well known.

original: lte ba'i gnas nas rin chen mgrin //
analyzed: lte ba'i gnas nas rin chen mgrin //
translated: From the navel to the throat,

original: de srid du ni bzhi par bshad //
analyzed: de srid du ni bzhi par bshad //
translated: as long as that, the fourth is explained.

original: de ltar sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi //
translated: Thus, the fourfold union

original: cha dang dga' ba gnyis dga' ldan //🔽cha rnams ji ltar rigs pa ru ;
analyzed: cha dang dga' ba gnyis dga' ldan // cha rnams ji ltar rigs pa ru ;
translated: is the two joys and the joy of the parts.

original: / yod pa de ltar lha mo nyon //
analyzed: / yod pa de ltar lha mo nyon //
translated: As there are parts, so there are goddesses.

original: bcu drug de bzhin nyi ma yi //
analyzed: bcu drug de bzhin nyi ma yi //
translated: The sixteen and likewise the sun,

original: gnyis ka gang du yang dag 'dus //
analyzed: gnyis ka gang du yang dag 'dus //
translated: where both are completely gathered,

original: der skye'i go 'phang cha med pa //
analyzed: der skye'i go 'phang cha med pa //
translated: there the stage of birth is partless,

original: lhan skyes bdag nyid shes par bya //
analyzed: lhan skyes bdag nyid shes par bya //
translated: to be known as the nature of the innate.

original: 'byung po thams cad tshim byed pa //
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad tshim byed pa //
translated: Satisfying all the elements,

original: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin no //
translated: it is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: bcu drug cis bya shes rab 'gyur //
analyzed: bcu drug cis bya shes rab 'gyur //
translated: The sixteen is wisdom,

original: nyi ma thabs su bshad pa yin //
analyzed: nyi ma thabs su bshad pa yin //
translated: and the sun is explained as method.

original: rin chen mgrin pa thob tsam na //
analyzed: rin chen mgrin pa thob tsam na //
translated: As soon as the throat is reached,

original: gsal bar zla ba gang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gsal bar zla ba gang bar 'gyur //
translated: It becomes the full moon.

original: de nyid gnyis ka'i shes bya ste //
analyzed: de nyid gnyis ka'i shes bya ste //
translated: That itself is the object of knowledge of both.

original: cha ni dga' bas rgyan byas pa'o //
analyzed: cha ni dga' bas rgyan byas pa'o //
translated: The part is adorned with joy.

original: bco lnga rnams kyi skye ba ni //
analyzed: bco lnga rnams kyi skye ba ni //
translated: The birth of the fifteen

original: bcu drug pa ste rtog mi byed //
analyzed: bcu drug pa ste rtog mi byed //
translated: is the sixteenth, which is not imagined.

original: 'char dang nub pa spangs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'char dang nub pa spangs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it abandons rising and setting,

original: de la sbyor ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de la sbyor ba med pa'o //
translated: there is no application to that.

original: zhes so // 'dir /
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir /
translated: Here,

original: ji srid gser bu gnas mgrin pa //
analyzed: ji srid gser bu gnas mgrin pa //
translated: as long as the moon abides in the throat,

original: de srid pa brgyad phyed thig le rnams //
analyzed: de srid pa brgyad phyed thig le rnams //
translated: for that long the half-tiīkās are eight.

original: zhes pa'i gsung las /🔽mgrin pa'i rgyab nas ni steng zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i gsung las / mgrin pa'i rgyab nas ni steng zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: From that statement,🔽“above” is the back of the throat.

original: mtha'i gnas nas ni mgrin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mtha'i gnas nas ni mgrin pa'i 'o //
translated: “From the end” is from the throat.

original: bcu drug gi ni zla ba'i cha bcu drug gi'o //
analyzed: bcu drug gi ni zla ba'i cha bcu drug gi'o //
translated: “Of the sixteen” is of the sixteen parts of the moon.

original: gang du ni rin chen gyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: gang du ni rin chen gyi dbus su'o //
translated: “Where” is in the middle of the jewel.

original: tshim byed pa ni dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshim byed pa ni dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: “Satisfying” is delighting.

original: gnyis ka'i ni nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i ni nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi'o //
translated: “Of both” is of the sun and moon.

original: de nyid ni cha gang ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni cha gang ba ste /
translated: “That itself” is the full part.

original: nor bu dga' ba rnams kyis yang ngo //
analyzed: nor bu dga' ba rnams kyis yang ngo //
translated: “Again” is the jewel.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa yang ste bco lnga rnams kyi ni cha rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa yang ste bco lnga rnams kyi ni cha rnams kyi'o //
translated: The fifteen parts are of arising and ceasing.

original: bcu drug pa ni cha ste kun rdzob pa'o //
analyzed: bcu drug pa ni cha ste kun rdzob pa'o //
translated: The sixteenth part is the relative.

original: rtog mi byed ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //🔽de nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad la skye ba dang 'jig pa srid na yang 'di 'char ba dang nub pa med cing rnal 'byor zhes brjod de /
analyzed: rtog mi byed ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad la skye ba dang 'jig pa srid na yang 'di 'char ba dang nub pa med cing rnal 'byor zhes brjod de /
translated: Not conceptualizing is non-conceptual.

original: de'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang don @208a * //
analyzed: de'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang don @208a * //
translated: Therefore, although arising and ceasing are possible for all phenomena, this is said to be yoga, since it is free from arising and ceasing.

original: dam pa mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dam pa mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of that, it is the ultimate.

original: de lta bu kho na la mngon par dgongs nas brtag pa gnyis par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de lta bu kho na la mngon par dgongs nas brtag pa gnyis par gsungs pa /
translated: With that very intention, the second chapter says:

original: gang phyir bcu drug pa cha med //🔽ces so // kun rdzob tu ni 'char ba dang nub pa ldan zhing /
analyzed: gang phyir bcu drug pa cha med // ces so // kun rdzob tu ni 'char ba dang nub pa ldan zhing /
translated: Because the sixteenth part is partless,🔽it is the ultimate.🔽Arising and ceasing are possessed conventionally.

original: lhan cig skyes pa yang chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye bas yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa yang chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye bas yod pa kho na ste /
translated: The connate is also definitely existent, divided into lesser and so on.

original: ji ltar ni /
analyzed: ji ltar ni /
translated: How is that?

original: gtsug tor las ni 'char ba'o de'i //
analyzed: gtsug tor las ni 'char ba'o de'i //
translated: Arising from the uṣṇīṣa,

original: gang ba rdo rje nor bu 'gyur //
analyzed: gang ba rdo rje nor bu 'gyur //
translated: it fills the vajra jewel.

original: 'di yi bde ba che rang bzhin //
analyzed: 'di yi bde ba che rang bzhin //
translated: The great nature of its bliss

original: gang ba'i sgra yis brjod par bya //
analyzed: gang ba'i sgra yis brjod par bya //
translated: is to be expressed by the sound of filling.

original: de ltar / gang bar mi g-yo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de ltar / gang bar mi g-yo ba 'di ni /
translated: Thus, this filling, which is unwavering,

original: sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid //
analyzed: sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid //
translated: is the complete perfection of the stages.

original: nyi khri brgyad gnyis brgya yi dbugs //
analyzed: nyi khri brgyad gnyis brgya yi dbugs //
translated: The breath is twenty-one thousand six hundred.

original: 'gyur med skad cig zos rnams kyis //
analyzed: 'gyur med skad cig zos rnams kyis //
translated: The immutable moments of that

original: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa //
analyzed: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa //
translated: are the twelve aspects of the truth of suffering.

original: rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur ba med //
translated: The sixteen aspects are immutable.

original: sa rnams kyis ni rnam bcu gnyis //
analyzed: sa rnams kyis ni rnam bcu gnyis //
translated: The stages are the twelve aspects.

original: gang ba gnyis su med pa mchog / cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs pa'i sems //
analyzed: gang ba gnyis su med pa mchog / cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs pa'i sems //
translated: The supreme, nondual filling is the complete mind with parts.

original: rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The sixteen aspects are immutable.

original: de skad du yang phyag rgya chen po thig ler //
analyzed: de skad du yang phyag rgya chen po thig ler //
translated: Thus, in the Drop of the Great Seal:

original: gang phyir padma rnams kyi dngos //
analyzed: gang phyir padma rnams kyi dngos //
translated: Since the nature of the lotuses

original: kha sbyor rnam pa'i sbyor ba las //
analyzed: kha sbyor rnam pa'i sbyor ba las //
translated: is the union of the aspect of union,

original: de phyir kun dga' ba'i sems kyis //
analyzed: de phyir kun dga' ba'i sems kyis //
translated: therefore, with a joyful mind,

original: 'gro dang 'ong ba rtsi ltar lags //
analyzed: 'gro dang 'ong ba rtsi ltar lags //
translated: the coming and going are like counting.

original: bka' stsal pa /🔽shes rab thabs ni snyoms 'jug pas //
analyzed: bka' stsal pa / shes rab thabs ni snyoms 'jug pas //
translated: The Bhagavān replied:🔽When bliss arises correctly

original: gang tshe bde ba yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: gang tshe bde ba yang dag 'byung //
translated: through the union of wisdom and method,

original: de tshe aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam //
analyzed: de tshe aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam //
translated: At that time, the yogi goes to the place of the non-worldly

original: 'jig rten pa min gnas su 'gro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa min gnas su 'gro //
translated: through the path of the avadhūtī.

original: gang tshe srog rlung rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: gang tshe srog rlung rnal 'byor pas //
translated: When the yogi does not release the life-force

original: der mi 'dor ba de yi tshe //🔽'og tu kha phyogs padma rnams //
analyzed: der mi 'dor ba de yi tshe // 'og tu kha phyogs padma rnams //
translated: at that time,🔽the lotuses that face downward

original: 'gro'o gyen du phyogs par yang //
analyzed: 'gro'o gyen du phyogs par yang //
translated: go upward.

original: de nas srog gi steng du yid //
analyzed: de nas srog gi steng du yid //
translated: Then, the mind is on the life-force,

original: de mi mthun pas 'bab par 'gyur //🔽padma'i lte ba'i dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: de mi mthun pas 'bab par 'gyur // padma'i lte ba'i dbus gnas pa //
translated: and by that, it descends.🔽When it becomes stable

original: gang tshe phyi nas brtan 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang tshe phyi nas brtan 'gyur ba //
translated: in the middle of the center of the lotus,

original: de tshe mgon po 'gro mi 'gyur //🔽ji ltar bu ga me snod du //
analyzed: de tshe mgon po 'gro mi 'gyur // ji ltar bu ga me snod du //
translated: at that time, the lord does not move.🔽Just as water does not disappear

original: chu rnams zad pa med gnas ltar //
analyzed: chu rnams zad pa med gnas ltar //
translated: in a hole that is a vessel for fire,

original: de tshe bde ba brtan par 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe bde ba brtan par 'gyur //
translated: at that time, bliss becomes stable.

original: brtan pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' //🔽de phyir sangs rgyas mi zad pa //
