translated: The delighted is Amitābha, the essence of the purified aggregate of perception, because of the engagement of non-conceptuality.

original: 'od dpag med kyis zhes pa 'od dpag med la'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyis zhes pa 'od dpag med la'o //
translated: The one with Amitābha is Amitābha.

original: thams cad bdag nyid ni don yod grub pa ste 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang sems pa la sogs pa rnams thams cad 'di'i bdag nyid yin zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid ni don yod grub pa ste 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang sems pa la sogs pa rnams thams cad 'di'i bdag nyid yin zhes byas nas so //
translated: The one with the nature of all is Amoghasiddhi, because of the purified aggregate of compositional factors, all feeling, perception, intention, and so forth are of the nature of this one.

original: tshor ba dang 'du shes dag ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i nang du 'dus par sngar bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: tshor ba dang 'du shes dag ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i nang du 'dus par sngar bsgrubs zin to //
translated: It was previously established that feeling and perception are included in the aggregate of compositional factors.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: gang tshe zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang tshe zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: When, and so on.

original: gang gi tshe don yod la rtag tu bzhugs pa de'i tshe rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med la yang ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe don yod la rtag tu bzhugs pa de'i tshe rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med la yang ste /
translated: When it is always present in Amoghasiddhi, then it is also in Ratnasaṃbhava and Amitābha,

original: 'di dag don yod grub pa'i nang du 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag don yod grub pa'i nang du 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: because these are included in Amoghasiddhi. This is the intended meaning.

original: rtag tu bzhugs pa ni /🔽shin tu rnam dag ye shes che //
analyzed: rtag tu bzhugs pa ni / shin tu rnam dag ye shes che //
translated: Always present🔽is connected with

original: zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: zhes 'brel te /
translated: great utterly pure pristine consciousness.

original: sngar bzhin du rtag tu bzhugs pa mi bskyod pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sngar bzhin du rtag tu bzhugs pa mi bskyod pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: As before, always present is Akṣobhya.

original: de ltar gsungs @227a * //
analyzed: de ltar gsungs @227a * //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: pa'i rim gyis /
analyzed: pa'i rim gyis /
translated: By the sequence of statements,

original: bdud rtsi lnga yi dngos gong bu //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga yi dngos gong bu //
translated: the five ambrosias

original: zhes pa / khams dang ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / dus mtha' yas pa ma tshang ba med par 'tsho ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan rnams kyi yang tshogs gnyis rgyas par byed pa'i phyir bdud rtsi rnams te /
analyzed: zhes pa / khams dang ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / dus mtha' yas pa ma tshang ba med par 'tsho ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan rnams kyi yang tshogs gnyis rgyas par byed pa'i phyir bdud rtsi rnams te /
translated: means that the five elements, pristine consciousnesses, and tathāgatas are the essence of nonabiding nirvāṇa, the cause of living for endless eons without incompleteness, and the cause of increasing the two accumulations of others.

original: de'i dngos ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / gong bu ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / gong bu ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Its essence is their nature, and its mass is the body of perfect rapture, which is the nature of the bodhicitta.

original: thig le'i gzugs zhes pa phra ba ste /
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs zhes pa phra ba ste /
translated: The form of the drop is subtle.

original: ku sha'i rtse mo lta bu'i blo can sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kho nas mthong ba'i bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ku sha'i rtse mo lta bu'i blo can sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kho nas mthong ba'i bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is seen only by the lords of the tenth stage, whose intellect is like the tip of a kuśa blade.

original: dpe med pa zhes pa dpe las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: dpe med pa zhes pa dpe las 'das pa ste /
translated: It is incomparable, beyond all comparison.

original: gang na yang 'di 'dra ba'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: gang na yang 'di 'dra ba'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pas so //
translated: There is nothing anywhere that is even slightly of the nature of this nectar.

original: lha mo kun gyi ste /
analyzed: lha mo kun gyi ste /
translated: It is of all the goddesses,

original: spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang rdo rje snyems ma rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang rdo rje snyems ma rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: that is, of Locanā, Māmakī, Pāṇḍaravāsinī, Tārā, and Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: de ltar gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyi don rnam pa gsum brjod pas khams dang ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi rnams kyi brten pa lnga pa'i rang bzhin nyid du rgyas par bstan cing /
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyi don rnam pa gsum brjod pas khams dang ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi rnams kyi brten pa lnga pa'i rang bzhin nyid du rgyas par bstan cing /
translated: Thus, by expressing the meaning of “secret” and so forth, the five supports of the elements, pristine consciousness, and the four tathāgatas are extensively explained to be the nature of the fifth.

original: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ni rtog pas ldog pa'i dbye ba nye bar gzung nas so //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ni rtog pas ldog pa'i dbye ba nye bar gzung nas so //
translated: The support and the supported are differentiated by the intellect.

original: lnga pa yang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa nyid kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: lnga pa yang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa nyid kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Also, the fifth is the nature of Vajradhara because of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Vajrasattva and so on are explained.

original: phal cher bshad zin to //
analyzed: phal cher bshad zin to //
translated: Most of them have already been explained.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa 'di ni /
translated: This “Vajrasattva”

original: chos kyi sku ru rab tu bsgrags te /
analyzed: chos kyi sku ru rab tu bsgrags te /
translated: is proclaimed to be the dharmakāya.

original: chos kyi sku rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is the clarifier of the dharmakāya.

original: snying rje'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid na yang ;
analyzed: snying rje'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid na yang ;
translated: Also, the nature of great bliss is compassion.

original: stong pa nyid rtogs pa la dri ma ma lus pa rtsa ba med pas na gtso bo'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rtogs pa la dri ma ma lus pa rtsa ba med pas na gtso bo'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absence of all faults, the realization of emptiness is the principal one.

original: da ni bde ba chen po nyams su myong bar 'di bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bde ba chen po nyams su myong bar 'di bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach the experience of great bliss, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: de nyid kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “That itself,” and so on.

original: de'i ste byang chub sems kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i ste byang chub sems kyi'o //
translated: That is, of bodhicitta.

original: rab tu gyur pa bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i shes pa 'di la yin pa ni shas rab ste /
analyzed: rab tu gyur pa bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i shes pa 'di la yin pa ni shas rab ste /
translated: The transformation of that into the nature of great bliss is the wisdom,

original: rdul gyi ngo bo'i gtum mo'o //
analyzed: rdul gyi ngo bo'i gtum mo'o //
translated: which is the caṇḍālī of the nature of the particle.

original: ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it innate?

original: gang gi phyir de la ro gcig pa nyid kyis gyur par 'di'i ngo bo yod pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la ro gcig pa nyid kyis gyur par 'di'i ngo bo yod pas so //
translated: Because it is of one taste with that, it is its nature.

original: ji ltar 'di lta bu yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di lta bu yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it like this? He declares,

original: las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Action,” and so on.

original: las ni 'dir bsgoms pas sems brtan pa rdzogs @227b pa'o ;
analyzed: las ni 'dir bsgoms pas sems brtan pa rdzogs @227b pa'o ;
translated: Here, action is the completion of the firm mind through meditation.

original: / des bskul ba lte ba'i 'og nas gnas pa'i rlung ste /
analyzed: / des bskul ba lte ba'i 'og nas gnas pa'i rlung ste /
translated: That [action] is the wind that resides below the navel.

original: des mchog tu 'bar ba byas pa'o //
analyzed: des mchog tu 'bar ba byas pa'o //
translated: That causes the supreme blazing.

original: sems brtan pa na la la n'a dang ra sa n'a ru rlung mi rgyu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems brtan pa na la la n'a dang ra sa n'a ru rlung mi rgyu ba'i phyir /
translated: When the mind is stable, the winds do not move in the lalanā and rasanā,

original: aa wa dh'u t'i ru 'jug pa na lte ba'i 'og gi rlung gis sngar bzhin pa gang gi tshe 'bar ba de'i tshe 'di lta bu'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: aa wa dh'u t'i ru 'jug pa na lte ba'i 'og gi rlung gis sngar bzhin pa gang gi tshe 'bar ba de'i tshe 'di lta bu'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: and enter the avadhūti. When the wind below the navel blazes as before, then it is like this.

original: skra rtse brgya stong yan lag can //
analyzed: skra rtse brgya stong yan lag can //
translated: Having a hundred thousand hair-tip parts.

original: zhes skra'i rtse mo rnams kyi brgya phrag stong gi yan lag rnams dang 'dra ba yan lag ste cha shas 'od kyi ngo bo rnams su gang gi 'phrog pa de ni de skad do //
analyzed: zhes skra'i rtse mo rnams kyi brgya phrag stong gi yan lag rnams dang 'dra ba yan lag ste cha shas 'od kyi ngo bo rnams su gang gi 'phrog pa de ni de skad do //
translated: The parts, i.e., the portions, of the hair-tips, which are like a hundred thousand parts, are the parts, i.e., the portions, which are the nature of light that are stolen by him.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: glog gi zer ma mnyam pa'i 'od //
analyzed: glog gi zer ma mnyam pa'i 'od //
translated: The light of the lightning flash is equal.

original: ces pa'o // skra'i rtse mo'i tshig ni yan lag rnams phra ba nyid du nye bar mtshon par byed do //
analyzed: ces pa'o // skra'i rtse mo'i tshig ni yan lag rnams phra ba nyid du nye bar mtshon par byed do //
translated: The word hair-tip indicates the fineness of the parts.

original: 'di skad du gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di skad du gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgoms pas sems brtan pa la sa bon la sogs pa las bskyed pa med par bcom ldan 'das ma dbyings kyi thig le bdag med ma ming gzhan rdul gyi ngo bo rang bzhin gyis 'bar ro //🔽'od zer phra mo rnams kyi rtsa rnams yan lag thams cad bzhin du gang bar byed do //🔽bcom ldan 'das zla ba yang des gdungs pa shin tu ches 'bab po //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgoms pas sems brtan pa la sa bon la sogs pa las bskyed pa med par bcom ldan 'das ma dbyings kyi thig le bdag med ma ming gzhan rdul gyi ngo bo rang bzhin gyis 'bar ro // 'od zer phra mo rnams kyi rtsa rnams yan lag thams cad bzhin du gang bar byed do // bcom ldan 'das zla ba yang des gdungs pa shin tu ches 'bab po //
translated: Meditating on the perfect maṇḍala, the mind is stable. Without being generated from a seed and so on, Bhagavatī Ākāśa-bindu-niḥsvabhāvā, otherwise known as the essence of the particle, blazes by nature.🔽The nāḍīs of the subtle light rays fill all the limbs.🔽The Bhagavān moon is also very much melted by that.🔽

original: des gsos pa'i gtum mo yang nges bar shin tu 'bar ro //🔽zla ba des gdungs pa yang shin tu ches 'dzag go //🔽gtum mo'i 'od kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i rtsa rnams kyang bde ba chen po'i zla ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis gang bar byed do zhes pas yan lag thams cad khyab par byed pa nang du nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzugs shes rab dang thams cad 'dus pa 'khor
analyzed: des gsos pa'i gtum mo yang nges bar shin tu 'bar ro //🔽zla ba des gdungs pa yang shin tu ches 'dzag go //🔽gtum mo'i 'od kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i rtsa rnams kyang bde ba chen po'i zla ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis gang bar byed do zhes pas yan lag thams cad khyab par byed pa nang du nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzugs shes rab dang thams cad 'dus pa 'khor
translated: Meditating on the perfect maṇḍala, the mind is stable. Without being generated from a seed and so on, Bhagavatī Ākāśa-dhātu-nāḍī-garbhā-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nāḍī-nā

original: ba'i bar du ro mnyam pa bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni phung po dang / khams la sogs pa'i sgro 'dogs pa ma lus pa zil gyis gnon zhing 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ba'i bar du ro mnyam pa bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni phung po dang / khams la sogs pa'i sgro 'dogs pa ma lus pa zil gyis gnon zhing 'byung ngo //
translated: The experience of great bliss, which is the sameness of taste up to the crown cakra, overcomes all the superimpositions of the aggregates, elements, and so on.

original: gang rnams de ltar mi mos pa de rnams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig par rgyas par bstan pa'i bzlas pas srog rtsol la dbang ba nyid thob pas thur sel gyi rlung bskums nas /
analyzed: gang rnams de ltar mi mos pa de rnams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig par rgyas par bstan pa'i bzlas pas srog rtsol la dbang ba nyid thob pas thur sel gyi rlung bskums nas /
translated: Those who are not inclined in that way, by the repetition of the extensive explanation in the twenty-first chapter, obtain control over the life-force and downward-voiding vāyus.

original: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po la dmigs te /
analyzed: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po la dmigs te /
translated: The downward-voiding vāyu is withdrawn and focuses on the mahāmudrā in the navel cakra.

original: rlung zlog pa rnams kyis gtum mo 'bar bar byed do //
analyzed: rlung zlog pa rnams kyis gtum mo 'bar bar byed do //
translated: The vāyu is reversed by the vāyu yogas, and caṇḍālī blazes.

original: de las kyang de lta kho nar bde ba chen po gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang de lta kho nar bde ba chen po gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From that, great bliss manifests in just the same way.

original: de ltar mi nus pas ni de ltar kho nar lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rlung 'gags par mos nas gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar mi nus pas ni de ltar kho nar lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rlung 'gags par mos nas gnas pa ste /
translated: Those who are unable to do that in that way imagine that the vāyu is blocked in the navel cakra and remain there.

original: dbugs 'byung ba gyon du 'gro ba na /
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba gyon du 'gro ba na /
translated: When exhaling,

original: ri mo drang po gtum @228a * //
analyzed: ri mo drang po gtum @228a * //
translated: the straight line of the caṇḍālī

original: mo'i ngo bo yis bcom ldan 'das ma 'bar bar mos te /
analyzed: mo'i ngo bo yis bcom ldan 'das ma 'bar bar mos te /
translated: essence is imagined as blazing Bhagavatī.

original: bde ba chen po'i gnas rjes su thob cing /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gnas rjes su thob cing /
translated: Having attained the abode of great bliss,

original: dbugs 'jug pa na ham yig zla ba 'dzag pa thig le'i gzugs kyis /
analyzed: dbugs 'jug pa na ham yig zla ba 'dzag pa thig le'i gzugs kyis /
translated: when the breath enters, the syllable haṃ, in the form of a drop, drips down from the moon.

original: de la dmigs bzhin pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'ongs nas dmigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la dmigs bzhin pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'ongs nas dmigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: While visualizing that, the nature of great bliss comes to the maṇḍala at the navel and becomes non-apprehensible.

original: de ltar ji srid du srog 'gog pa'i bar du nges par gnas pas de lta kho nar rlung 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa dag yang dang yang du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ji srid du srog 'gog pa'i bar du nges par gnas pas de lta kho nar rlung 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa dag yang dang yang du gnas par bya'o //
translated: In that way, as long as one is able to stop the prāṇa, one should repeatedly cause the exhalation and inhalation of the breath to remain just like that.

original: gang yang srog 'byung ba dang 'jug pa brtag par mi nus pa des lhag par mos pa tsam kho nar sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: gang yang srog 'byung ba dang 'jug pa brtag par mi nus pa des lhag par mos pa tsam kho nar sgrub par byed do //
translated: One who is unable to observe the exhalation and inhalation of the prāṇa should practice merely by way of imagination.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos ni de sngon ma can kho nar 'di mtha' dag stobs ji lta bar dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i //🔽rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sgrub pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos ni de sngon ma can kho nar 'di mtha' dag stobs ji lta bar dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i // rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sgrub pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: One who meditates on the creation stage should visualize all of this just as it is, according to one’s strength, from the beginning.

original: lha'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lha'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In order to teach the extensive practice for those who delight in the extensive, [the Bhagavān] declares, “the deity,” and so on.

original: lha'i rnal 'byor dus su ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa na'o //
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor dus su ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa na'o //
translated: At the time of the divine yoga, when one meditates on the creation stage.

original: ba spu'i bu ga'i mtshams rnams su zhes pa bdun pa ni lnga pa'i don la'o //
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga'i mtshams rnams su zhes pa bdun pa ni lnga pa'i don la'o //
translated: The “joints” of the pores, the seventh case [genitive] has the sense of the fifth [ablative].

original: spu rnams kyi bu ga ni khung bu rnams dang rtse mo rnams yin zhing mtshams rnams ni spu dang bral ba'i phyogs rnams te de rnams las so //
analyzed: spu rnams kyi bu ga ni khung bu rnams dang rtse mo rnams yin zhing mtshams rnams ni spu dang bral ba'i phyogs rnams te de rnams las so //
translated: The pores of the hairs are the holes and tips of the hairs, and the joints are the parts devoid of hair.

original: sdigs par byed ces pa /
analyzed: sdigs par byed ces pa /
translated: “Threatening” means

original: 'khor ba pa rnams dang por bshad par bya'o zhes sdigs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba pa rnams dang por bshad par bya'o zhes sdigs par byed pa ste /
translated: threatening to explain samsara first.

original: de'i rjes su yang dag par reg nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byed do zhes pa man ngag go //
analyzed: de'i rjes su yang dag par reg nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byed do zhes pa man ngag go //
translated: After that, having touched reality, one should make it the nature of perfect buddhahood—this is the instruction.

original: lha dang lha min rnams zhes pa 'khor ba pa rnams nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang lha min rnams zhes pa 'khor ba pa rnams nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: “Gods and demigods” illustrates samsara.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo ste phung po lnga'i ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams bsregs nas te gdungs nas so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo ste phung po lnga'i ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams bsregs nas te gdungs nas so //
translated: Having burned the wheel of Dharma, the nature of the five aggregates, the five tathagatas,

original: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyang ngo //
translated: The enjoyment wheel, the goddesses Locanā and so forth, whose nature is earth and so forth, are also [the buddhas].

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas reg pa tsam gyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su byas pa rnams kyang nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas reg pa tsam gyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su byas pa rnams kyang nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas, who are endowed with supramundane gnosis, are also indicated, those who are made perfect buddhas by merely touching the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: sngar bshad kho na'i zhes pa mdzod spur son pa kho na'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad kho na'i zhes pa mdzod spur son pa kho na'o //
translated: The one explained before is the one located in the ūrṇā.

original: snga ma bzhin zhes pa ji ltar de'i shes rab ces pa la sogs pas bshad pa de ltar bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin zhes pa ji ltar de'i shes rab ces pa la sogs pas bshad pa de ltar bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: As before means that, like the explanation in the verse beginning “His wisdom,” it is the nature of great bliss.

original: 'di na 'dir bsdus pa'i don te /
analyzed: 'di na 'dir bsdus pa'i don te /
translated: Here is the summarized meaning:

original: bskyed pa'i rim pas lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas @228b ji ltar nus pa ltar sngar bshad pa'i phyogs bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i phyogs la dmigs nas /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pas lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas @228b ji ltar nus pa ltar sngar bshad pa'i phyogs bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i phyogs la dmigs nas /
translated: Endowed with the deity yoga of the creation stage, one focuses on any of the four directions explained above, to the extent that one is able.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo mtha' dag gi rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma gtum mo'i ngo bo nyid 'bar du 'jug go //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo mtha' dag gi rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma gtum mo'i ngo bo nyid 'bar du 'jug go //
translated: The Blessed Lady, Nairātmya, the nature of the entire wheel of Yoginīs, the essence of the Great Seal, the nature of Caṇḍālī, is ignited.

original: de 'bar ba yang 'od phra mo dpag tu med pa 'phros pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: de 'bar ba yang 'od phra mo dpag tu med pa 'phros pa rnams kyis /
translated: That ignition is the emission of immeasurable subtle light rays.

original: ba spu'i bu ga dang rtse mo dang mtshams rnams khyab par byas nas de rnams las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga dang rtse mo dang mtshams rnams khyab par byas nas de rnams las 'byung ngo //
translated: They pervade the pores, tips, and joints, and emerge from them.

original: aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam gyis kyang steng du 'gro zhing chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnams dang phung po lnga la sogs pa rnams gdungs nas ;
analyzed: aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam gyis kyang steng du 'gro zhing chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnams dang phung po lnga la sogs pa rnams gdungs nas ;
translated: Also, through the path of the avadhūti, they ascend and melt the wheels of Dharma, Enjoyment, and Great Bliss, and the five aggregates, and so on.

original: sna bug g-yas pa las dang mdzod spu'i khung bu las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sna bug g-yas pa las dang mdzod spu'i khung bu las 'byung ngo //
translated: They emerge from the right nostril and the aperture of Brahmā.

original: rnam pa gsum po phyir byung ba yang glog gi 'od bzhin du phyogs rnams su khyab nas /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum po phyir byung ba yang glog gi 'od bzhin du phyogs rnams su khyab nas /
translated: The three aspects that emerge externally pervade the directions like lightning flashes.

original: 'khor ba pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtha' dag la reg cing rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bskyed de /
analyzed: 'khor ba pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtha' dag la reg cing rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bskyed de /
translated: Having touched all of the beings in cyclic existence, the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas, they generate the form of perfect buddhahood.

original: de rnams kyi dang rang nyid grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sna bug g-yon pa nas bzhugs nas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gdungs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dang rang nyid grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sna bug g-yon pa nas bzhugs nas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gdungs te /
translated: Those buddhas and oneself dwell in the left nostril of the buddhas and melt the great-bliss wheel.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad 'dod chags chen po'i me'i 'od kyis bskul cing 'dod chags chen po'i rjes su chags pa rnams sgom pa po'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i bu ga nas zhugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad 'dod chags chen po'i me'i 'od kyis bskul cing 'dod chags chen po'i rjes su chags pa rnams sgom pa po'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i bu ga nas zhugs te /
translated: All those tathāgatas are implored by the light of the fire of great passion and, with great passion, enter the cranial aperture of the meditator.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas pa na zla ba dang lhan cig zhu bar byas nas de zhu ba dang ro gcig pa 'og tu 'dzag pa /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas pa na zla ba dang lhan cig zhu bar byas nas de zhu ba dang ro gcig pa 'og tu 'dzag pa /
translated: Dwelling in the great-bliss wheel, they melt together with the moon and, with a single taste, drip down.

original: phung po la sogs pa sgro 'dogs pa zil gyis gnon pa shes rab dang thabs ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen po'i nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo lte bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa sgro 'dogs pa zil gyis gnon pa shes rab dang thabs ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen po'i nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo lte bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature of the experience of great bliss, which is the wisdom and method of the suppression of the superimposition of the aggregates and so forth, will abide in the navel.

original: de ltar 'di sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'di sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, this is the perfect empowerment of the buddhas.

original: yi ge bsgom pa la lhag par mos pa bsdus pa la dga' bas /
analyzed: yi ge bsgom pa la lhag par mos pa bsdus pa la dga' bas /
translated: Those who delight in the concise, who are devoted to the meditation of the syllables,

original: lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bo'i mtsho skyes kyi lte ba rnams la rim pa ji lta bar dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po steng dang 'og tu mgo bstan pa'i aam h'um aam ham yig rnams bsgoms te /
analyzed: lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bo'i mtsho skyes kyi lte ba rnams la rim pa ji lta bar dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po steng dang 'og tu mgo bstan pa'i aam h'um aam ham yig rnams bsgoms te /
translated: should meditate on the syllables a ra haṃ yaṃ, which are red, black, white, and yellow, respectively, in the center of the lakes of the navel, heart, throat, and head, with the head facing up and down.

original: aam gi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das ma gtum mo 'bar du gzhug go //
analyzed: aam gi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das ma gtum mo 'bar du gzhug go //
translated: The essence of a raṃ is the blazing of the Bhagavatī Caṇḍālī.

original: des kyang h'um dang aom gyi yi ge dag gdungs nas ham zhu bar byas te 'og @229a * //🔽tu 'dzag cing /
analyzed: des kyang h'um dang aom gyi yi ge dag gdungs nas ham zhu bar byas te 'og @229a * //🔽tu 'dzag cing /
translated: That also melts the syllables hūṃ and oṃ, and the haṃ melts and falls down.

original: de zhu ba dang aom h'um dag dang ro mnyam pa sngon bzhin du lte bar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de zhu ba dang aom h'um dag dang ro mnyam pa sngon bzhin du lte bar gnas par bya'o //
translated: That melts and becomes of the same taste as the oṃ and hūṃ, as before, abiding in the navel.

original: rgyas pa la dga' bas ni /
analyzed: rgyas pa la dga' bas ni /
translated: One who delights in increasing

original: yang lte bar steng du kha phyogs pa'i chu skyes dmar po'i lte bar zla ba'i steng du aam ngo //
analyzed: yang lte bar steng du kha phyogs pa'i chu skyes dmar po'i lte bar zla ba'i steng du aam ngo //
translated: again, in the navel, an upward-facing lotus, red, with an aṃ on a moon in its center.

original: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la g-yas skor du rim pa ji lta bar aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha ste brgyad rnams so //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la g-yas skor du rim pa ji lta bar aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha ste brgyad rnams so //
translated: On the petals in the east and so on, clockwise, are the eight a, ka, ca, ṭa, ta, pa, ya, and śa.

original: snying gar 'og tu kha phyogs pa'i padma dkar po'i lte ba la zla bar h'um ste /
analyzed: snying gar 'og tu kha phyogs pa'i padma dkar po'i lte ba la zla bar h'um ste /
translated: At the heart, an inverted white lotus has a hūṃ on a moon in its center.

original: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la aa ai au ae yig rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams lu ya r'a la wa rnams so //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la aa ai au ae yig rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams lu ya r'a la wa rnams so //
translated: On the petals in the east and so on are the vowels a, i, u, and e, and on the northeast and so on are the consonants lu, ya, ra, and la.

original: mgrin par gyen du kha phyogs pa'i chu skyes dmar po'i lte bar zla ba la aom ste /
analyzed: mgrin par gyen du kha phyogs pa'i chu skyes dmar po'i lte bar zla ba la aom ste /
translated: At the throat, an upward-facing red lotus has an oṃ on a moon in its center.

original: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la a'a a'i a'u aee yig rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su y'a r'a l'a w'a rnams so //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la a'a a'i a'u aee yig rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su y'a r'a l'a w'a rnams so //
translated: On the petals beginning with Indra, the consonants ya, ra, la, va.

original: mgo bor 'og tu kha phyogs pa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i sna tshogs padma la lte ba'i zla bar ham ste ;
analyzed: mgo bor 'og tu kha phyogs pa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i sna tshogs padma la lte ba'i zla bar ham ste ;
translated: On the head, facing down, on a variegated lotus with thirty-two petals, on the navel, the moon, the syllable haṃ.

original: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la re res bar du chod pa rnams la rim pa ji lta bar dbyangs bcu drug rnams so //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la re res bar du chod pa rnams la rim pa ji lta bar dbyangs bcu drug rnams so //
translated: On the petals beginning with the east, on the petals separated by one, the sixteen vowels in order.

original: aa dang ka la sogs pa'i yi ge 'di rnams thams cad kyang zla phyed dang thig le dang n'a da dang bcas pa ba mo 'dzag pa rnams su bsgom zhing /
analyzed: aa dang ka la sogs pa'i yi ge 'di rnams thams cad kyang zla phyed dang thig le dang n'a da dang bcas pa ba mo 'dzag pa rnams su bsgom zhing /
translated: All these syllables, a, ka, and so on, are imagined with a half-moon, a drop, and a nada, dripping nectar.

original: aam gi ngo bo'i gtum mo 'bar du 'jug go //
analyzed: aam gi ngo bo'i gtum mo 'bar du 'jug go //
translated: One causes the fierce fire, which is of the nature of haṃ, to blaze.

original: de yang gyen du 'gro zhing yi ge rnams thams cad gdungs par byed zhu bar byed do //
analyzed: de yang gyen du 'gro zhing yi ge rnams thams cad gdungs par byed zhu bar byed do //
translated: That, going upward, melts all the syllables.

original: de zhu ba dang ro gcig pa 'og tu sa bon pa ni lte bar sngar bzhin du ngal so'o //
analyzed: de zhu ba dang ro gcig pa 'og tu sa bon pa ni lte bar sngar bzhin du ngal so'o //
translated: With that melting, of one taste, the seed syllable below, as before, rests at the navel.

original: dpyid kyi thig le de kho na brtag pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: dpyid kyi thig le de kho na brtag pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
translated: is the King of Tantras of the Diamond-Holder, the Drop of Spring,

original: sngar bzhin du de rjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyang de skad do //🔽dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: sngar bzhin du de rjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyang de skad do // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: as before, the collection of texts which express it are also so called.

original: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu bzhi pa'o /
translated: The twenty-fourth flower of the Flower Cluster of Instructions

original: // / bcu gsum par mdor bstan pa'i brda rnams rgyas par bshad pa'i don dang / dgongs pa'i skad gzhan rtogs par byed pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / bcu gsum par mdor bstan pa'i brda rnams rgyas par bshad pa'i don dang / dgongs pa'i skad gzhan rtogs par byed pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: The thirteenth chapter is stated for the purpose of explaining the meanings of the symbols taught in brief, and for the purpose of understanding the other intended languages.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, etc.

original: ngag dang yan lag gi phyag rgya ni ngag dang phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ngag dang yan lag gi phyag rgya ni ngag dang phyag rgya'o //
translated: Speech and branch seals are speech and seals.

original: dam tshig che ni sbas pa'i brda'o //
analyzed: dam tshig che ni sbas pa'i brda'o //
translated: Great pledge is a hidden symbol.

original: ma phug pa ni ma mtshon pa'o //🔽'dis ni gsang ba nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: ma phug pa ni ma mtshon pa'o // 'dis ni gsang ba nyid du gsungs so //
translated: Not pierced is not indicated.🔽This is stated in the secret.

original: shin tu gsang ba nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: shin tu gsang ba nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The very secret is stated.

original: dgod ces pa la sogs @229b pa ste ;
analyzed: dgod ces pa la sogs @229b pa ste ;
translated: The smile, etc.

original: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma bzhi rnams kyi rgyud gang yin pa ni dgod pa dang bltas pa dag dang 'khyud pa dang gnyis gnyis dang lag bcad rnams kyis mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma bzhi rnams kyi rgyud gang yin pa ni dgod pa dang bltas pa dag dang 'khyud pa dang gnyis gnyis dang lag bcad rnams kyis mtshon pa'o //
translated: The tantras of the four classes of Kriya, Carya, Yoga, and Anuttara-yoga are indicated by the four acts of smiling, looking, embracing, and sexual union.

original: de ltar ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu lha rnams shes rab dang thabs dag  gis rjes su chags pa gsal bar byed pa lta ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu lha rnams shes rab dang thabs dag  gis rjes su chags pa gsal bar byed pa lta ba'o //
translated: In some Kriya and so on tantras, the deities are made to express their passion with wisdom and means, and this is indicated by the act of looking.

original: kha cig tu 'dzum pa'o //🔽kha cig tu lag pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu 'dzum pa'o // kha cig tu lag pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: In some, it is indicated by smiling.🔽In some, by holding hands.

original: kha cig tu 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu 'khyud pa'o //
translated: In some, by embracing.

original: kha cig tu gnyis gnyis so //
analyzed: kha cig tu gnyis gnyis so //
translated: In some, by sexual union.

original: 'di ltar gyur pa lta ba la sogs pa'i shin tu dga' ba can bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud kyis kyang ma bshad pa ni ma bsgrags pa'o ;
analyzed: 'di ltar gyur pa lta ba la sogs pa'i shin tu dga' ba can bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud kyis kyang ma bshad pa ni ma bsgrags pa'o ;
translated: The passion of looking and so on is not expressed in the Kriya and so on tantras, and so it is said to be secret.

original: / dgongs pa'i skad ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud rnams kho nas bsgrags pa 'ba' zhig ste /
analyzed: / dgongs pa'i skad ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud rnams kho nas bsgrags pa 'ba' zhig ste /
translated: The language of intention is expressed only in the Anuttara-yoga tantras.

original: de'i phyir mchog tu gsang ba'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mchog tu gsang ba'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is supremely secret.

original: dmigs pa gcig pa'i sems ni rtse gcig sems so //🔽'dir tshig shes pa rnams phan tshun du gal te dgongs pa'i skad kyis ni smra bar skad gzhan gyis tha snyad byed dam /
analyzed: dmigs pa gcig pa'i sems ni rtse gcig sems so // 'dir tshig shes pa rnams phan tshun du gal te dgongs pa'i skad kyis ni smra bar skad gzhan gyis tha snyad byed dam /
translated: The mind of one-pointedness is the single-pointed mind.

original: dam tshig mi shes pa'i mdun du smra bar byed na de'i tshe dam tshig dral ba'i phyir yams nad dang nye bar 'tshe ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gnod do zhes gzhan du gsungs so //
analyzed: dam tshig mi shes pa'i mdun du smra bar byed na de'i tshe dam tshig dral ba'i phyir yams nad dang nye bar 'tshe ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gnod do zhes gzhan du gsungs so //
translated: Here, those who know the words should speak to each other with the intention language, or if they speak with another language, then at that time, because the commitment is broken, they are harmed by epidemics, calamities, and so forth.

original: dpa' bo sring mo'i zhes pa rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma dag gi'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo sring mo'i zhes pa rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma dag gi'o //
translated: The hero and sister are the yogis and yoginis.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa po'i rnal 'byor pas bstan pa la sems can gzhug pa'i ched du ltung bar byed pa dang dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang rengs pa zhes pa lta stangs bzhi gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa po'i rnal 'byor pas bstan pa la sems can gzhug pa'i ched du ltung bar byed pa dang dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang rengs pa zhes pa lta stangs bzhi gsungs pa /
translated: The yogi who accomplishes the feat of the great seal, for the purpose of engaging sentient beings in the teaching, speaks of the four gazes: the gaze of bringing down, the gaze of magnetizing, the gaze of summoning, and the gaze of paralyzing.

original: mnyam pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The even gaze, and so forth.

original: mnyam pa ni mi yo ba'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa ni mi yo ba'o //
translated: Evenness is not wavering.

original: gdug pa ni khro bo'i nyams te /
analyzed: gdug pa ni khro bo'i nyams te /
translated: Fierceness is the experience of wrath.

original: de ltar gzhan la yang lta stangs dang rjes su mthun pa las sems kyi nyams shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan la yang lta stangs dang rjes su mthun pa las sems kyi nyams shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand the experience of the mind in accordance with the gaze and the other [expressions].

original: de la gang yang dag par phyogs par blta zhing khro bo'i nyams can mig 'bras dag gis dpral ba la brten pa de ni ltung byed kyi lta stangs so //
analyzed: de la gang yang dag par phyogs par blta zhing khro bo'i nyams can mig 'bras dag gis dpral ba la brten pa de ni ltung byed kyi lta stangs so //
translated: Among them, the gaze that is directed straight ahead with a wrathful experience and with the eyes resting on the forehead is the gaze of the bringer-down.

original: g-yon pa la brten pa'i mig 'bras gnyis can g-yon du blta ba ni dbang du bya ba'o //🔽mig 'bras gnyis steng du brten zhing g-yas su blta ba ni dgug pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la brten pa'i mig 'bras gnyis can g-yon du blta ba ni dbang du bya ba'o // mig 'bras gnyis steng du brten zhing g-yas su blta ba ni dgug pa'o //
translated: The gaze that is directed to the left with the two eyes resting on the left is for bringing under one's control.🔽The gaze that is directed to the right with the two eyes resting above is for summoning.

original: sna gong la brten pa'i mig 'bras gnyis can mngon du phyogs par blta ba ni rengs pa'o //🔽mig 'bras gnyis sna'i rtse mor brten @230a * //
analyzed: sna gong la brten pa'i mig 'bras gnyis can mngon du phyogs par blta ba ni rengs pa'o // mig 'bras gnyis sna'i rtse mor brten @230a * //
translated: The gaze that is directed straight ahead with the two eyes resting on the bridge of the nose is for paralyzing.

original: cing 'phred du blta ba yang ltung ba'i lta stangs so //
analyzed: cing 'phred du blta ba yang ltung ba'i lta stangs so //
translated: The gaze that is directed to the side with the two eyes resting at the tip of the nose is also the gaze of the bringer-down.

original: srog gcod pa yang ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: srog gcod pa yang ni ltung ba'o //
translated: Taking life is also bringing down.

original: de ltar yang gsod pa ni slar 'tsho bar bya nus pa kho nas bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsod pa ni slar 'tsho bar bya nus pa kho nas bya ste /
translated: Thus, killing is done only by one who is able to revive.

original: gzhan du na sems can rnams gzhug pa'i don du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can rnams gzhug pa'i don du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, how could it be for the sake of introducing sentient beings?

original: 'tsho bar bya mi nus pas sems can gsod par byas pa las /
analyzed: 'tsho bar bya mi nus pas sems can gsod par byas pa las /
translated: Since one is not able to revive, one does not go to a happy rebirth by killing sentient beings.🔽What is the point of accomplishing the highest aim of a person?

original: bde 'gror 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur na skyes bu'i don gyi mchog 'grub pa'i don ci zhig / de skad du yang brtag pa gnyis par bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bde 'gror 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur na skyes bu'i don gyi mchog 'grub pa'i don ci zhig / de skad du yang brtag pa gnyis par bka' stsal pa /
translated: Thus, the second chapter says:

original: gsad pa 'di ni bya ba min //
analyzed: gsad pa 'di ni bya ba min //
translated: This killing is not to be done.

original: dam tshig ches cher nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: dam tshig ches cher nyams par 'gyur //
translated: It is a great transgression of the pledge.

original: sems can slu ba spangs nas ni //
analyzed: sems can slu ba spangs nas ni //
translated: Having abandoned the deception of sentient beings,

original: bya ba ma yin thams cad bya ;🔽/ sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin thams cad bya ; / sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: do all that is not to be done.🔽The power of the seal is not attained

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur //🔽zhes so // dbugs phyir 'byung ba ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur // zhes so // dbugs phyir 'byung ba ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: by merely harming sentient beings.🔽Exhaling is exhaling.

original: rab tu gzhug pa ni dgang ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu gzhug pa ni dgang ba'o //
translated: Fully introducing is filling.

original: nang gang ba ni bum pa can no //
analyzed: nang gang ba ni bum pa can no //
translated: The inner filled is the vase.

original: zhugs nas g-yo med gyur pa ni zhi ba can no //
analyzed: zhugs nas g-yo med gyur pa ni zhi ba can no //
translated: Having entered, becoming unmoving is the peaceful one.

original: 'di rnams goms par bya ba'i ched du rim pa ji lta bar khu ba dang bcas pa'i shing dang me tog dang rdo rje'i shing dang g-yo ba rtsa zhes pa mtshon pa bzhi rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di rnams goms par bya ba'i ched du rim pa ji lta bar khu ba dang bcas pa'i shing dang me tog dang rdo rje'i shing dang g-yo ba rtsa zhes pa mtshon pa bzhi rnams gsungs pa /
translated: In order to practice these, the four symbols of the tree with semen, the flower, the vajra tree, and the moving channel are taught in order.

original: ltung ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ltung ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The falling and so forth.

original: 'khrul pa ni phyin ci log go //
analyzed: 'khrul pa ni phyin ci log go //
translated: Error is the opposite.

original: ngal so ba med par goms par byed pa ni lta ci smos /
analyzed: ngal so ba med par goms par byed pa ni lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to speak of practicing without rest?

original: dngos grub gsal bar byed pa'i brda'i bye brag rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: dngos grub gsal bar byed pa'i brda'i bye brag rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: The extensive teaching of the particular symbols that illuminate power is stated:

original: gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: two and so forth.

original: kun du spyod pa la dge ba ni slob dpon dang kun du spyod pa yod na legs pa can slob dpon ni slob dpon dag ste //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa la dge ba ni slob dpon dang kun du spyod pa yod na legs pa can slob dpon ni slob dpon dag ste //
translated: The virtuous in conduct are the masters, and if there is conduct, the virtuous are the masters.

original: gcig lhag las so //
analyzed: gcig lhag las so //
translated: One is left over.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig dang kun du spyod pa la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'dod pa'i lha'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal cing /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig dang kun du spyod pa la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'dod pa'i lha'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal cing /
translated: having bowed to the yoginī who is the nature of the desired deity such as Vajrasattva,🔽that enchantress who is the embodiment of one’s desired deity,

original: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs can ma de kun du spyod pas yid 'phrog pa mo de yang de la slar phyag byed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs can ma de kun du spyod pas yid 'phrog pa mo de yang de la slar phyag byed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: also bows to him.

original: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma g-yas pas steng du lta zhing smin ma g-yas bsgul bas /
analyzed: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma g-yas pas steng du lta zhing smin ma g-yas bsgul bas /
translated: Thus, the yoginī, looking up with her right eye, and moving her right eyebrow,🔽having meditated on Vajrasattva and so forth, for the sake of going in the sky to accomplish the welfare of sentient beings,

original: nam mkha' la sems can gyi bya ba 'grub pa'i ched du 'gro ba'i ched du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa la gyen gnas kyi dngos grub rdzu 'phrul dang mngon shes 'byung bar 'gyur @230b ro zhes gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sems can gyi bya ba 'grub pa'i ched du 'gro ba'i ched du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa la gyen gnas kyi dngos grub rdzu 'phrul dang mngon shes 'byung bar 'gyur @230b ro zhes gsal bar byed do //
translated: the yogi/nī will attain the power of rising up, and the power of magical abilities and superknowledge.

original: 'gyur ro zhes pa ni da ltar ba dang nye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro zhes pa ni da ltar ba dang nye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Will attain” is because of being close to the present.

original: de ltar phyi ma la'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyi ma la'o //
translated: Thus, it is for the future.

original: g-yon pa steng du lta ba ni /
analyzed: g-yon pa steng du lta ba ni /
translated: The left eye is upward-looking.

original: g-yon pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The left eye is upward-looking, etc.

original: pha rol gyi dpung ni bsam gtan gyi bar chad byed pa'i pha rol gyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: pha rol gyi dpung ni bsam gtan gyi bar chad byed pa'i pha rol gyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: The enemy army is the enemy's wheel which creates obstacles to the meditative concentration.

original: de 'joms pa ni bdud rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: de 'joms pa ni bdud rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: Its destruction is the subjugation of the demons.

original: rnal 'byor de nyid kyi shes pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de nyid kyi shes pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: The yogi's knowledge is the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, etc.

original: 'du shes ni brda bya bar 'dis 'du shes par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'du shes ni brda bya bar 'dis 'du shes par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: The idea is that he should be recognized by this sign.🔽There is the form of Gauri, etc.

original: der zhes pa goo r'i la sogs pa'i gzugs de'i rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: der zhes pa goo r'i la sogs pa'i gzugs de'i rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i dngos grub bo //
translated: The accomplishment of the nature of perfection.

original: g-yon las cig shos kyi 'gul na yang lta stangs kyi bye brag gis so //
analyzed: g-yon las cig shos kyi 'gul na yang lta stangs kyi bye brag gis so //
translated: Even if the other moves from the left, it is by the particular gaze.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tha snyad 'grub cing 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa dgag pa sogs pa yang brda chad la sogs pa kha cig la'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tha snyad 'grub cing 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa dgag pa sogs pa yang brda chad la sogs pa kha cig la'o //
translated: Thus, the supramundane convention is accomplished, and the mundane accomplishment, etc. are also in some words, etc.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa rnal 'byor pa'i'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa rnal 'byor pa'i'o //
translated: The yogi's is the yogi's.

original: yang dag par brjod pa 'di'i'o zhes pa sdud pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par brjod pa 'di'i'o zhes pa sdud pa ste /
translated: The compendium is this correct expression.

original: gsung rab kyi brjod bya'i don no //
analyzed: gsung rab kyi brjod bya'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the subject matter of the scriptures.

original: de'i dngos grub ni rang gi don rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub ni rang gi don rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Its success is the completion of one's own aim.

original: de yong na gzhan gyi don ni legs pa gsungs pa ni bstan pa ste de 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: de yong na gzhan gyi don ni legs pa gsungs pa ni bstan pa ste de 'grub pa'o //
translated: When that is accomplished, the aim of others is the establishment of the teaching, which is the statement of the good.

original: lta stangs lta ba dang phyag rgya smin ma bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lta stangs lta ba dang phyag rgya smin ma bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of glances, gazes, and gestures is the knowledge of glances, gazes, and gestures, such as the movement of the eyebrows.

original: de dag gis mngon par 'dod pa shes pa ni lta stangs dang phyag rgya'i shes pa ste bshad do zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de dag gis mngon par 'dod pa shes pa ni lta stangs dang phyag rgya'i shes pa ste bshad do zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The knowledge of the secret signs is the knowledge of the secret signs, such as the vajra-binding.

original: las rab 'byam brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /🔽dpal zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las rab 'byam brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa / dpal zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the ritual actions is the knowledge of the ritual actions, such as the summoning and so on.🔽The knowledge of the mantras is the knowledge of the mantras, such as om vajra-sumbhani, and so on.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo'o //🔽de'i ji lta'i dbyibs ni sku ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo'o // de'i ji lta'i dbyibs ni sku ste /
translated: The knowledge of the mudras is the knowledge of the mudras, such as the vajra-binding and so on.🔽The knowledge of the mandala is the knowledge of the mandala, such as the Vajra-Essence Mandala and so on.🔽The knowledge of the deity is the knowledge of the deity, such as Vajrasattva and so on.

original: de dang ldan pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: The knowledge of the mantra-lord is the knowledge of the mantra-lord, such as Vajrasattva and so on.🔽The knowledge of the mantra-lord's form is the knowledge of the mantra-lord's form, such as Vajrasattva and so on.🔽The knowledge of the mantra-lord's body is the knowledge of the mantra-lord's body, such as Vajrasattva and so on.

original: thod pa ni 'dir ram gzhan du gnyis skyes la sogs pa'i khyad par can ma byung ba na rma med pa gzugs mdzes pa bsngags so //
analyzed: thod pa ni 'dir ram gzhan du gnyis skyes la sogs pa'i khyad par can ma byung ba na rma med pa gzugs mdzes pa bsngags so //
translated: The skull is praised as being without a wound, and beautiful in form, if it is not of a special kind, such as that of a hermaphrodite.

original: de yang bud med rnams kyi dang sngags pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de yang bud med rnams kyi dang sngags pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Moreover, it is of a woman, and of a man.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: gser gyi sgo dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: gser gyi sgo dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with a golden door,

original: mi yi thod par shes par bya //
analyzed: mi yi thod par shes par bya //
translated: one should know the human skull.

original: bram ze la sogs thod pa ni /
analyzed: bram ze la sogs thod pa ni /
translated: The skull of a brahmin, etc.,

original: rna ba re re 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: rna ba re re 'phel ba'o //
translated: has one hole for each ear.

original: rigs dman pa yi thod pa ni //
analyzed: rigs dman pa yi thod pa ni //
translated: The skull of an inferior caste

original: rna ba'i steng du bug par 'gyur //
analyzed: rna ba'i steng du bug par 'gyur //
translated: has a hole above the ear.

original: rgyab tu bug can ma ning gi'o //
analyzed: rgyab tu bug can ma ning gi'o //
translated: The skull of a eunuch has a hole in the back.

original: bud med kyi rtag tu rma med //
analyzed: bud med kyi rtag tu rma med //
translated: The skull of a woman is always without a wound.🔽The wise one should know the skull

original: mkhas pa'i thod @231a * //🔽par shes ldan gyis //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i thod @231a * // par shes ldan gyis //
translated: of a learned man.🔽The magician should know

original: shes bya de bzhin sngags pa yis //
analyzed: shes bya de bzhin sngags pa yis //
translated: the skull of a man of knowledge.

original: mu tig phreng 'dra'i ri mo ni //
analyzed: mu tig phreng 'dra'i ri mo ni //
translated: The line like a pearl necklace

original: dbral bar rna ba'i dung dag la'o //
analyzed: dbral bar rna ba'i dung dag la'o //
translated: is on the forehead, on the conch of the ear.

original: zhes so // gzugs bzang ba ni ri bong can la sogs pa rnams gang yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes so // gzugs bzang ba ni ri bong can la sogs pa rnams gang yang rung ba'o //
translated: A beautiful form is any of those of a rabbit, etc.

original: gcig gnyis gsum bzhi'i dum bu can ;
analyzed: gcig gnyis gsum bzhi'i dum bu can ;
translated: One should know the skull with one, two, three, or four sections.

original: / bcu drug bcu gnyis ri bong can //
analyzed: / bcu drug bcu gnyis ri bong can //
translated: The sixteen and twelve are the moon.

original: ba lang kha ni dkar dmar 'gyur //
analyzed: ba lang kha ni dkar dmar 'gyur //
translated: The cow is white and red.

original: cung zad ring zhing shin tu mdzes //
analyzed: cung zad ring zhing shin tu mdzes //
translated: It is a little long and very beautiful.

original: padma padma'i rnam pa 'dra //
analyzed: padma padma'i rnam pa 'dra //
translated: The lotus is like the form of a lotus.

original: ser dang dmar dang de bzhin dkar //
analyzed: ser dang dmar dang de bzhin dkar //
translated: Yellow, red, and likewise white,

original: rab tu bsngags pa'i thod pa rnams //
analyzed: rab tu bsngags pa'i thod pa rnams //
translated: are the praised skulls.

original: lhag ma rnams ni rnam par spang //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni rnam par spang //
translated: The rest are rejected.

original: zhes so // lhag ma rnams ni rul ba dang gas pa la sogs rnams so //
analyzed: zhes so // lhag ma rnams ni rul ba dang gas pa la sogs rnams so //
translated: The rest are rotten, cracked, and so forth.

original: yungs kar bskyed nas zhes pa yungs kar btab nas so //
analyzed: yungs kar bskyed nas zhes pa yungs kar btab nas so //
translated: Having planted mustard seed means having sown mustard seed.

original: cho ga bzhin zhes pa dang por gnyis skyes kyi thod par bskyed cing /
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes pa dang por gnyis skyes kyi thod par bskyed cing /
translated: According to the rite means first generating in the skull of a hermaphrodite,

original: de'i rjes su mi gzhan gyi ru'o zhes pa la sogs pa cho ga'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su mi gzhan gyi ru'o zhes pa la sogs pa cho ga'o //
translated: and after that in the skull of another person, and so forth.

original: yi dags la sogs pa rnams thams cad las bsrung ba ni thams cad bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: yi dags la sogs pa rnams thams cad las bsrung ba ni thams cad bsrung ba'o //
translated: The protection from all such things as ghosts is the protection from all.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor mdor bstan pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor mdor bstan pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the concise explanation of the yoga of Vajrasattva, he says,

original: dpal zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpal zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “glory” and so forth.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor bas steng ge mche ba rnams kyis ma mchu mnan pa ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor bas steng ge mche ba rnams kyis ma mchu mnan pa ste /
translated: By the right yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, the upper fangs bite the lower lip.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yang dag par sbyar ba gang gi yin pa de de skad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yang dag par sbyar ba gang gi yin pa de de skad do //
translated: Therefore, he who is rightly joined is so called.

original: ma mchu mnan zhing sbyar dang bcas //🔽zhes 'don pa la ni ma mchu mnan zhing sbyar ba dang lhan cig 'jug pa'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma mchu mnan zhing sbyar dang bcas // zhes 'don pa la ni ma mchu mnan zhing sbyar ba dang lhan cig 'jug pa'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Biting the lower lip, with union.🔽In the reading “biting the lower lip, with union,” it should be connected as “biting the lower lip, with union engaged.”

original: g-yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang thod pa dang zhags pa rnams 'gying bas 'dzin no zhes pa g-yon pa 'gying 'dzin no //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang thod pa dang zhags pa rnams 'gying bas 'dzin no zhes pa g-yon pa 'gying 'dzin no //
translated: He holds the left vajra, bell, skull, and noose with a flirtatious manner.

original: dpal ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje snyems ma ste de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje snyems ma ste de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Glorious is Bhagavatī Vajragarvā, and he is endowed with her.

original: g-yas pas rdo rje dang ral gri dang lcags kyus phyogs kyi 'khor lor bgegs 'joms pa'i tshul rnams kyis gsal cing gsal bar so sor snang bar ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar phyag rgyar mdzad byin gyis rlob par mdzad ces 'brel lo //
analyzed: g-yas pas rdo rje dang ral gri dang lcags kyus phyogs kyi 'khor lor bgegs 'joms pa'i tshul rnams kyis gsal cing gsal bar so sor snang bar ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar phyag rgyar mdzad byin gyis rlob par mdzad ces 'brel lo //
translated: He is the color of a dark cloud, with three eyes and bared fangs.🔽He is adorned with a garland of dry skulls and a crown of five dry skulls.🔽He is in union with the Vajra Queen, who is similar to himself.🔽He is the color of a dark cloud, with three eyes and bared fangs.

original: steng 'og ces pa thad kar yang zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: steng 'og ces pa thad kar yang zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: He is adorned with a garland of fresh heads and a crown of fresh heads.🔽He is in union with the Vajra Queen, who is similar to himself.🔽He is the color of a dark cloud, with three eyes and bared fangs.

original: sa dang sa steng zhes pa ni mtho ris zhes pa lhag ma ste /
analyzed: sa dang sa steng zhes pa ni mtho ris zhes pa lhag ma ste /
translated: He is adorned with a garland of dry skulls and a crown of five dry skulls.🔽He is in union with the Vajra Queen, who is similar to himself.

original: de ni sa 'og dang mtho ris dang mi yul rnams zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ni sa 'og dang mtho ris dang mi yul rnams zhes pa'i don to //
translated: He is the color of a dark cloud, with three eyes and bared fangs.🔽He is adorned with a garland of fresh heads and a crown of fresh heads.

original: rang nyid ces pa rdo rje sems dpa'i @231b bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rang nyid ces pa rdo rje sems dpa'i @231b bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: He is in union with the Vajra Queen, who is similar to himself.

original: rgyas 'debs pa yang 'di rnams la bgegs mi 'jug pa'i don no //
analyzed: rgyas 'debs pa yang 'di rnams la bgegs mi 'jug pa'i don no //
translated: He is the color of a dark cloud, with three eyes and bared fangs.🔽He is adorned with a garland of dry skulls and a crown of five dry skulls.🔽He is in union with the Vajra Queen, who is similar to himself.🔽He is the color of a dark cloud, with three eyes and bared fangs.🔽He is adorned with a garland of fresh heads and a crown of fresh heads.🔽He is in union with the Vajra Queen, who is similar to himself.

original: de ltar bsgoms bzhin pa ni sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can las rab 'byam la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms bzhin pa ni sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can las rab 'byam la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He is the color of a dark cloud, with three eyes and bared fangs.🔽He is adorned with a garland of dry skulls and a crown of five dry skulls.🔽He is in union with the Vajra Queen, who is similar to himself.

original: 'di skad gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs te /
translated: He is the color

original: yud kyis tha mal pa'i lus stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su ji skad bshad pa'i phyag dang sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid kyi /
analyzed: yud kyis tha mal pa'i lus stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su ji skad bshad pa'i phyag dang sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid kyi /
translated: In an instant, after the emptiness of the ordinary body, one should imagine oneself as Vajrasattva, with the hand implements and body color and so on as previously explained,

original: 'og tu nyi ma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um gi 'od zer las skyes pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis mtshams med cing dum bu las gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rdo rje gur dang / mda'i dra ba dang bla re dang /
analyzed: 'og tu nyi ma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um gi 'od zer las skyes pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis mtshams med cing dum bu las gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rdo rje gur dang / mda'i dra ba dang bla re dang /
translated: standing on a variegated vajra situated on a sun in the lower part, with blazing vajras produced from the light rays of the hūṃ, which are not interrupted by the gaps between the sections, and which have become one piece. Above that, one should imagine a vajra tent, a net of arrows, a canopy,🔽a vajra fence on the sides, and a ground below that, which is the nature of a variegated vajra.

original: logs su rdo rje ra ba  dang / 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi bsam par bya'o zhes pa mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og rgyas gdab pa bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: logs su rdo rje ra ba  dang / 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi bsam par bya'o zhes pa mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og rgyas gdab pa bsgrubs nas /
translated: Having thus accomplished the pervasion of the higher realms, the human realm, and the lower realms,

original: de'i dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi mar bhr'um las skyes pa'i 'khor lo ser po g-yas su 'khor ba rtsibs bcu pa'i lte ba'i dbus kyi nang du /
analyzed: de'i dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi mar bhr'um las skyes pa'i 'khor lo ser po g-yas su 'khor ba rtsibs bcu pa'i lte ba'i dbus kyi nang du /
translated: in the center of that, on a variegated lotus and sun, from bhrūṃ arises a yellow wheel with ten spokes, turning to the right. In the center of the hub,

original: yud kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nges par gyur pas /
analyzed: yud kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nges par gyur pas /
translated: In an instant, he definitely becomes the nature of Vajrasattva,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs te /
translated: the form of Vajrahūṃkāra as explained,

original: rtsibs kyi rtse mo bcu la sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo bcu po bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtsad nas 'byin par mdzad pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu rnams byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: rtsibs kyi rtse mo bcu la sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo bcu po bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtsad nas 'byin par mdzad pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu rnams byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: and the ten wrathful ones as explained, abiding on variegated lotuses and suns at the tips of the ten spokes, who thoroughly eradicate the hosts of obstructors.

original: 'og dang steng dang thad kar khor yug chen po'i mthar thug par 'gro ba la rnam pa thams cad du bgegs med par mos nas /
analyzed: 'og dang steng dang thad kar khor yug chen po'i mthar thug par 'gro ba la rnam pa thams cad du bgegs med par mos nas /
translated: Blessing the ten directions, he imagines that he is free from all obstacles in all ways, above, below, and in the cardinal and intermediate directions, reaching to the end of the great enclosure.

original: yud kyis shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs kho na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin /
analyzed: yud kyis shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs kho na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin /
translated: In an instant, he is the form of Vajradhara with wisdom, the nature of all buddhas, such as Vairocana,

original: goms pa phul du byung ba las gsal bar rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa so sor snang ba dang ldan pas ni /
analyzed: goms pa phul du byung ba las gsal bar rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa so sor snang ba dang ldan pas ni /
translated: and so on, appearing individually, clearly, and vividly through the culmination of familiarity.

original: las rab 'byam thams cad sgrub par byed cing dngos grub thob par byed cing /
analyzed: las rab 'byam thams cad sgrub par byed cing dngos grub thob par byed cing /
translated: One should accomplish all the various activities, and one should attain power,

original: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: and not in any other way,

original: yi dags la sogs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mthu 'phrog pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yi dags la sogs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mthu 'phrog pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: because the ghosts, etc. steal the power of the medicine.

original: sgom pa chen po byas pa 'di las gzhan pa yang ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor bsgom pa kho nas bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: sgom pa chen po byas pa 'di las gzhan pa yang ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor bsgom pa kho nas bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: One should accomplish this by meditating only on the nature of Vajrasattva,
and not otherwise.

original: kyang sman gyis kyang bgegs rnams la bsrung ba byas nas so //
analyzed: kyang sman gyis kyang bgegs rnams la bsrung ba byas nas so //
translated: However, one should also protect against the obstructors by means of the medicine.

original: de'i ngo bor gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i ngo bor gsungs pa /
translated: The nature of that is stated:

original: mi'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The human skull, etc.

original: des ni ji skad bshad pa rigs pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kho nas gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bar /
analyzed: des ni ji skad bshad pa rigs pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kho nas gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bar /
translated: By that, having first given the sacrificial offering only in the nature of Vajradhara, as explained,

original: dang por bram ze'i thod pa de'i rten gyis sa bkang bar /
analyzed: dang por bram ze'i thod pa de'i rten gyis sa bkang bar /
translated: one should fill the skull of a Brahmin with earth,

original: gal te dben pa'i sa gzhi thob na /
analyzed: gal te dben pa'i sa gzhi thob na /
translated: and if one obtains a secluded place,

original: yungs kar bskyed do //
analyzed: yungs kar bskyed do //
translated: one should cultivate white mustard seeds.

original: de'i 'bras bu mi gang su yang rung ba'i thod par de lta kho na bskyed do //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu mi gang su yang rung ba'i thod par de lta kho na bskyed do //
translated: The fruit of that is generated in the skull of any person whatsoever.

original: de'i lo ma skam por bya ba yang dang 'bras bu'i mar khu tshod mar byas te zos nas 'bras bu'i mar khu mgo bo la byugs pa byas te /
analyzed: de'i lo ma skam por bya ba yang dang 'bras bu'i mar khu tshod mar byas te zos nas 'bras bu'i mar khu mgo bo la byugs pa byas te /
translated: The leaves are dried and the fruit juice is made into a sauce. Having eaten that, the fruit juice is applied to the head.

original: 'bras bus bgegs bskrad pa'i bsam pas phyogs rnams su 'phangs pa rnams kyis srung bar mos bzhin pas thams cad sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: 'bras bus bgegs bskrad pa'i bsam pas phyogs rnams su 'phangs pa rnams kyis srung bar mos bzhin pas thams cad sgrub par byed do //
translated: Having imagined that one is protected by the fruit juice that is thrown in the directions with the intention of warding off obstacles, one accomplishes everything.

original: gnyis skyes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis skyes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The second line begins “the fruit of the white olumba flower.”

original: 'di zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'ol ma se dkar po'i 'bras bu dang por bram ze'i thod par sngar bzhin bskyed nas /🔽de'i 'bras bu mi gzhan gyi thod par de lta kho nar btab cing /
analyzed: 'di zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'ol ma se dkar po'i 'bras bu dang por bram ze'i thod par sngar bzhin bskyed nas / de'i 'bras bu mi gzhan gyi thod par de lta kho nar btab cing /
translated: “This” refers to the white olumba flower. Having generated it in the skull of a Brahmin as before,🔽the fruit of that is planted in the skull of another person in just that way.

original: de'i 'bras bu bzung nas srog chags gang dang gang gi thod par sngar bzhin du bskyed do //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu bzung nas srog chags gang dang gang gi thod par sngar bzhin du bskyed do //
translated: Having taken the fruit, it is generated in the skull of any living being as before.

original: de'i 'bras bu de dang de'i gzugs su gsal bar 'gyur bar 'dod pas kha'i dbus su bzhag cing de dang de'i gzugs 'dzin no //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu de dang de'i gzugs su gsal bar 'gyur bar 'dod pas kha'i dbus su bzhag cing de dang de'i gzugs 'dzin no //
translated: The result of that is the form of that and that, which is clearly manifest.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa la bud med la sogs pa rnams dang bya rog la sogs pa rnams kyi thod par btab nas zhes 'jug go //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa la bud med la sogs pa rnams dang bya rog la sogs pa rnams kyi thod par btab nas zhes 'jug go //
translated: Then, having placed it in the skull of a woman, etc., and a crow, etc., one should enter.

original: ro'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ro'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the corpse, etc.

original: dur khrod ni sa gang du mi ro bsregs pa'o //
analyzed: dur khrod ni sa gang du mi ro bsregs pa'o //
translated: A charnel ground is where a human corpse is burned.

original: gu gul ni gu gul lo //
analyzed: gu gul ni gu gul lo //
translated: Guggulu is bdellium.

original: 'byung po'i nyin mo ni nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'byung po'i nyin mo ni nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi'o //
translated: The day of the bhūta is the fourteenth of the dark lunar fortnight.

original: 'byung po'i nyin mo la mi shi ba'i kha'i nang du gzhag pa'i gu gul dur khrod kyi mes bsregs bzhin pa bdug spos reg pa las mi la yi dags la sogs pa gang dbab par 'dod pa de 'bab par byed cing sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa
analyzed: 'byung po'i nyin mo la mi shi ba'i kha'i nang du gzhag pa'i gu gul dur khrod kyi mes bsregs bzhin pa bdug spos reg pa las mi la yi dags la sogs pa gang dbab par 'dod pa de 'bab par byed cing sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa
translated: On the day of the bhūta, one should place the bdellium in the mouth of a dead person and burn it with the fire of a charnel ground. By the touch of the smoke, whichever ghost, etc., one wishes to descend, that one will descend and speak what is desired by the adept.

original: smra'o // bdug pa spangs pa las babs pa grol ba'o //
analyzed: smra'o // bdug pa spangs pa las babs pa grol ba'o //
translated: By abandoning the incense, the descended one is freed.

original: gser shing ni dha du ra'o //
analyzed: gser shing ni dha du ra'o //
translated: The golden tree is dhattura.

original: a'a lam ni ba bla'o //
analyzed: a'a lam ni ba bla'o //
translated: The aalam is babble.

original: dum bu ni dum zhogs so //
analyzed: dum bu ni dum zhogs so //
translated: The piece is a piece of food.

original: drug po 'di rnams bsres pa ro'i khar gnas pa rnams sngar bzhin @232b no ;
analyzed: drug po 'di rnams bsres pa ro'i khar gnas pa rnams sngar bzhin @232b no ;
translated: These six are mixed together.

original: / rta gsong ni ka ra bi ra'o //
analyzed: / rta gsong ni ka ra bi ra'o //
translated: The horse dung is karavira.

original: nyi ma'i shing ni aar ka ste de'i shing nang na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i shing ni aar ka ste de'i shing nang na gnas pa'o //
translated: The sun tree is arka, and it is located in the tree.

original: phye ma leb ni srog chags so //
analyzed: phye ma leb ni srog chags so //
translated: The butterfly is a living being.

original: sdig pa ni kar ka'i ste /
analyzed: sdig pa ni kar ka'i ste /
translated: The sin is karaka.

original: rnga ma ni mjug ma'o //
analyzed: rnga ma ni mjug ma'o //
translated: The tail is the tail.

original: bong nga'i dug gi brgya'i cha shas so //
analyzed: bong nga'i dug gi brgya'i cha shas so //
translated: It is one hundredth part of the poison of the donkey.

original: 'di bzhi btags pas byugs pa'i lag pa ni lag pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di bzhi btags pas byugs pa'i lag pa ni lag pa kho na'o //
translated: These four are applied to the hand.

original: go nas ni sprul ti li ta sa ste de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: go nas ni sprul ti li ta sa ste de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The gohana is the tilita snake, and it becomes like that.

original: de lag pa la reg pa na zos zin pa bzhin du ga 'phos pa'i phyir ro //🔽b'a na r'i ni ka si ka tstsha ste /
analyzed: de lag pa la reg pa na zos zin pa bzhin du ga 'phos pa'i phyir ro // b'a na r'i ni ka si ka tstsha ste /
translated: When it touches the hand, it moves like something already eaten.🔽The vanara is the kasika.

original: ka tstsha sim bhi zhes rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: ka tstsha sim bhi zhes rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: The kasika is well known as simbhi.

original: b'a na r'i'i 'bras bu'i spu rnams aa rka'i 'o mas nyin zhag bdun rnams su bsgom zhing /
analyzed: b'a na r'i'i 'bras bu'i spu rnams aa rka'i 'o mas nyin zhag bdun rnams su bsgom zhing /
translated: The hairs of the fruit of the vānari are soaked for seven days in the milk of the arka plant.

original: de'i rjes su de rnams dang lhan cig btags pa'i thod lo kor /
analyzed: de'i rjes su de rnams dang lhan cig btags pa'i thod lo kor /
translated: Then, together with that, the skull is smeared.

original: de lta kho nar aa rka'i 'o ma'i dbus su zhag bdun rnams gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta kho nar aa rka'i 'o ma'i dbus su zhag bdun rnams gzhag par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, it is placed in the middle of the milk of the arka plant for seven days.

original: 'di lta'i de dag gis te wa na r'i dang thod lo kor dag gis sa gzhi la bris pa'i gdengs can dbang po ni sprul lo //
analyzed: 'di lta'i de dag gis te wa na r'i dang thod lo kor dag gis sa gzhi la bris pa'i gdengs can dbang po ni sprul lo //
translated: In this way, the king of the nāgas is drawn on the ground with the vānari and the skull.

original: dug gis bsreg go zhes pas na dug gis bsreg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dug gis bsreg go zhes pas na dug gis bsreg par 'gyur ro //
translated: “He is burned by poison” means that he is burned by poison.

original: gang gi phyir de la 'di reg pa las sos zin pa bzhin du dug rab tu rgyu'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la 'di reg pa las sos zin pa bzhin du dug rab tu rgyu'o //
translated: Because when he is touched by this, the poison spreads as if he were already cured.

original: 'di dag gi ni lag pa dang bris pas dug ldang ba dag gi'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gi ni lag pa dang bris pas dug ldang ba dag gi'o //
translated: This is the case for those whose poison arises from the touch of their hands and drawings.

original: ma la ya ru byung ba ni tsandan no //
analyzed: ma la ya ru byung ba ni tsandan no //
