translated: The sandalwood that arises in Malaya is the sandalwood.

original: n'a ge sar zhes pa n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog go //🔽nad kyi dbang po ni ru rta'o //
analyzed: n'a ge sar zhes pa n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog go // nad kyi dbang po ni ru rta'o //
translated: The nāgeśvara flower is the flower of the nāgeśvara.🔽The lord of the nāgas is the nutmeg.

original: rgya spos ni pindi ta ga ra'o //
analyzed: rgya spos ni pindi ta ga ra'o //
translated: The incense is the pine resin.

original: 'di lnga ni nad med de sman ni /
analyzed: 'di lnga ni nad med de sman ni /
translated: These five are the medicine.

original: 'bras bkrus pa'i chu yis gcig tu btags shing dkrugs la btung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bkrus pa'i chu yis gcig tu btags shing dkrugs la btung bar bya'o //
translated: They should be mixed together with water in which rice has been washed, stirred, and drunk.

original: 'phral du skyes pa'i byis pa'i brun sa la ma lhung ba'i ri lu btags pa rgya spos kyi rtsa ba'i dbus su gnas pa zos na /
analyzed: 'phral du skyes pa'i byis pa'i brun sa la ma lhung ba'i ri lu btags pa rgya spos kyi rtsa ba'i dbus su gnas pa zos na /
translated: A pill made from the ashes of a newborn child’s placenta, not fallen on the ground, mixed with the root of jātī, should be eaten.

original: dug 'thungs pa des mi gnod de //
analyzed: dug 'thungs pa des mi gnod de //
translated: The poison drunk by that person will not harm him.

original: sbal pa'i ni sbal ba nyid do //
analyzed: sbal pa'i ni sbal ba nyid do //
translated: The poison of a frog is that of a frog itself.

original: bad kan mthar 'byed ni ba hu w'a ra te de'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bad kan mthar 'byed ni ba hu w'a ra te de'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The fruit of bāhūvara is the final product of phlegm.

original: de dag bkol ba dag zhag gis btags pa lag pa la byugs nas sos zin pa la des reg par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag bkol ba dag zhag gis btags pa lag pa la byugs nas sos zin pa la des reg par bya'o //
translated: They should be mixed with ashes, smeared on the hand, and when it is dry, it should be touched by that person.

original: rdo rje can ni zur gsum pa shr'i kha nda'i shing ste /
analyzed: rdo rje can ni zur gsum pa shr'i kha nda'i shing ste /
translated: The vajra is the three-cornered śrīkhaṇḍa tree.

original: de'i 'o ma'o //
analyzed: de'i 'o ma'o //
translated: It is its milk.

original: mjug ma can ni rma bya ste de'i khrag go //
analyzed: mjug ma can ni rma bya ste de'i khrag go //
translated: The one with a tail is a peacock, its blood.

original: sprul gdong gnyis pa'i sha dang keng rus so //
analyzed: sprul gdong gnyis pa'i sha dang keng rus so //
translated: The flesh and bones of a two-faced snake.

original: 'di rnams kyis byugs pa'i rnga ni rol ba'i bye brag ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis byugs pa'i rnga ni rol ba'i bye brag ste /
translated: The drum smeared with these is a kind of musical instrument.

original: de'i skad las te sgra las so //
analyzed: de'i skad las te sgra las so //
translated: From its sound, that is, from the sound of the drum,

original: lus dang ldan pa la byugs zhes 'don pa la ni lus la byugs nas @233a * //
analyzed: lus dang ldan pa la byugs zhes 'don pa la ni lus la byugs nas @233a * //
translated: The reading anointed on the body means that one anoints the body.

original: gzhan la reg pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan la reg pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The reading anointed on the body means that one anoints one's body and then touches another.

original: gcer bu la sogs pa'i cho ga ni 'byung po'i zhag la gcer bur byung zhing skra grol ba gtor ma sbyin pa rnams te /🔽de rnams kyis mnyam par gzhag pa lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pas bzung ba'i b'a la ka'i rtsa ba'i dum bu bdun rnams /
analyzed: gcer bu la sogs pa'i cho ga ni 'byung po'i zhag la gcer bur byung zhing skra grol ba gtor ma sbyin pa rnams te / de rnams kyis mnyam par gzhag pa lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pas bzung ba'i b'a la ka'i rtsa ba'i dum bu bdun rnams /
translated: The rite of the naked, etc., is that on the day of the bhūta one should be naked, with loose hair, and give a sacrificial cake.🔽Those should be taken by one who is equipoised and endowed with deity yoga.

original: aom badzra ka ra h'um phat ces pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa lag pa g-yas pas bcings pa rnams so //
analyzed: aom badzra ka ra h'um phat ces pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa lag pa g-yas pas bcings pa rnams so //
translated: The seven pieces of the root of the balka plant should be bound with one's right hand, which is empowered by the mantra Oṃ vajra kara hūṃ phaṭ, and should be recited seven times.

original: lag 'gro'i dbang po ni sprul rgyal po ste /
analyzed: lag 'gro'i dbang po ni sprul rgyal po ste /
translated: The lord of the nāgas is the king of the nāgas.

original: de'i pags pa ni zhus pa dang / de las gang skyes pa de ni de skad do //
analyzed: de'i pags pa ni zhus pa dang / de las gang skyes pa de ni de skad do //
translated: His skin is the skin of that, and what is born from that is called that.

original: lag 'gro'i dgra ni rma bya ste de'i gshog pa'o ;
analyzed: lag 'gro'i dgra ni rma bya ste de'i gshog pa'o ;
translated: The enemy of the nāgas is the peacock, and its feathers are its wings.

original: / gtum pa'i me la cha mnyam pa ste sprul shun dang gshog pa dag gcig phyed dang gzhan phyed pa de las byung ba'i bdug spos reg pa las pha rol 'byed par byed do //
analyzed: / gtum pa'i me la cha mnyam pa ste sprul shun dang gshog pa dag gcig phyed dang gzhan phyed pa de las byung ba'i bdug spos reg pa las pha rol 'byed par byed do //
translated: The equal parts of the skin and feathers of a snake and a peacock, respectively, half and half, are burned in a fierce fire. The smoke from that, when inhaled, causes the separation of enemies.

original: ka gnyis pa ni bya rog go //
analyzed: ka gnyis pa ni bya rog go //
translated: The second ka is a crow.

original: nyin mos 'jigs ni 'ug pa'o //
analyzed: nyin mos 'jigs ni 'ug pa'o //
translated: The fear of the day is an owl.

original: cho ga ni gshog pa dag cha mnyam par byas pa gtum mo'i me la 'phang pa dang ldan pa'i nyams gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga ni gshog pa dag cha mnyam par byas pa gtum mo'i me la 'phang pa dang ldan pa'i nyams gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The rite is the burning of the equal parts of the wings in a fierce fire, which causes the manifestation of the experience.

original: sprul ni sprul nyid do //🔽gnod sbyin smyon pa ni khyi smyon no //
analyzed: sprul ni sprul nyid do // gnod sbyin smyon pa ni khyi smyon no //
translated: The snake is a snake itself.🔽The mad yakṣa is a mad dog.

original: thod pa can ni lam ga l'i'o /
analyzed: thod pa can ni lam ga l'i'o /
translated: The skull-bearer is a dog.

original: ro'i mgo skyes ni skra'o //
analyzed: ro'i mgo skyes ni skra'o //
translated: The head hair of a corpse is the hair.

original: mgrin rings ni rnga mo'o //
analyzed: mgrin rings ni rnga mo'o //
translated: The long neck is a camel.

original: 'di bzhi sbyar ba dgra'i sgor brkos la gzhag go ;
analyzed: 'di bzhi sbyar ba dgra'i sgor brkos la gzhag go ;
translated: These four are to be placed in the door of the enemy, having been dug into the ground.

original: / star bu ni ming grags pa ste /
analyzed: / star bu ni ming grags pa ste /
translated: The well-known name is “snake.”

original: gsum rnams kyis me long la byugs na der rta la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong ngo //🔽lag skyes ni sen mo'o //
analyzed: gsum rnams kyis me long la byugs na der rta la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong ngo // lag skyes ni sen mo'o //
translated: When the three are applied to a mirror, the forms of horses and so on are seen there.🔽The hand-born is a fingernail.

original: dar du ra ni sbal ba'o //
analyzed: dar du ra ni sbal ba'o //
translated: The dardura is a frog.

original: de rnams kyi ni rta la sogs pa rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ni rta la sogs pa rnams kyi ste /
translated: The etc. refers to horses and so on.

original: snga ma bzhin zhes pa me long la bsku ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin zhes pa me long la bsku ba'o //
translated: The as before refers to the application to the mirror.

original: 'on kyang sen mo'i thal ba dang zhag bsres pas bskus pa de kho na'i gzugs mthong gi /
analyzed: 'on kyang sen mo'i thal ba dang zhag bsres pas bskus pa de kho na'i gzugs mthong gi /
translated: However, one sees the form of just that which is applied with the ash of one's fingernails mixed with semen.

original: thams cad cig car nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad cig car nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not all at once.

original: aam ko tha'i sa bon gyi mar khu yis /
analyzed: aam ko tha'i sa bon gyi mar khu yis /
translated: With the oil of the seed of Amkotha

original: du ba bab pa kha dog gcig pa'i 'o mas mnyes te /
analyzed: du ba bab pa kha dog gcig pa'i 'o mas mnyes te /
translated: one should anoint the fallen smoke with milk of the same color.

original: skar ma rgyal la mig dag la mig sman du byas pa las te gzugs rnams ni bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: skar ma rgyal la mig dag la mig sman du byas pa las te gzugs rnams ni bdag nyid kyi'o //
translated: By applying it to the eyes under the constellation Pushya, one sees forms with one's own eyes.

original: rgya spos kyi 'bras bu dang aa ko ta'i 'bras bu'i mar khus du ba lhung ba tshigs ma ste /
analyzed: rgya spos kyi 'bras bu dang aa ko ta'i 'bras bu'i mar khus du ba lhung ba tshigs ma ste /
translated: With the oil of the fruit of the incense tree and the fruit of the Amkotha tree, one should anoint the fallen smoke with barley.

original: des byugs pa'i mig gis bzang po'i skyes bu'i gzugs mthong ngo //
analyzed: des byugs pa'i mig gis bzang po'i skyes bu'i gzugs mthong ngo //
translated: With the eyes anointed with that, one sees the form of a good person.

original: de'i mar khu'i mig sman gyis ni rang bzhin te sngar gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i mar khu'i mig sman gyis ni rang bzhin te sngar gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: With the collyrium of its oil, one sees one's own nature, one's former nature.

original: @233b ri bong can gyi chu ni se b'a la'o //
analyzed: @233b ri bong can gyi chu ni se b'a la'o //
translated: The water of the rabbit-holder is the Sevala.

original: bzhi po sbyar ba rnams kyis rkang pa'i mthil la byugs pa las me rengs par byed do //
analyzed: bzhi po sbyar ba rnams kyis rkang pa'i mthil la byugs pa las me rengs par byed do //
translated: The four combined, applied to the soles of the feet, paralyze the fire.

original: dge sbyong can ni mu ndi ga'o //
analyzed: dge sbyong can ni mu ndi ga'o //
translated: The ascetic is the munja grass.

original: zla ba las byung ba ni shes p'a la'o //
analyzed: zla ba las byung ba ni shes p'a la'o //
translated: The moon-born is the śaṅkha.

original: sprul la du na du bha ni to na da zhes rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: sprul la du na du bha ni to na da zhes rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: The snake is well known as the dhanapāninada.

original: de'i khrag thum por bcings pa'o //
analyzed: de'i khrag thum por bcings pa'o //
translated: Its blood is bound in a ball.

original: shing shyo n'a ka ni sho na zhes grags pa'o //
analyzed: shing shyo n'a ka ni sho na zhes grags pa'o //
translated: The śiṃśapā tree is known as the śoṇā.

original: ru ka ma'i btsag ni gser btsag go //
analyzed: ru ka ma'i btsag ni gser btsag go //
translated: The red arsenic is the gold arsenic.

original: dri ba ni sa ste rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: dri ba ni sa ste rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: The question is the earth, well known.

original: nya ni nya ste 'dir ro hi ta'o //
analyzed: nya ni nya ste 'dir ro hi ta'o //
translated: The fish is the fish, here the rohita.

original: bzhi rnams sbyar ba lde gur gyur pa rna ba la sogs pa rnams byugs pa las chu nub pa na rgyu'o //
analyzed: bzhi rnams sbyar ba lde gur gyur pa rna ba la sogs pa rnams byugs pa las chu nub pa na rgyu'o //
translated: The four combined, made into a paste, applied to the ears, etc., one floats in water.

original: shing srin ni shing gi nang du rgyu ba'i srin bu'o ;
analyzed: shing srin ni shing gi nang du rgyu ba'i srin bu'o ;
translated: The tree worm is a worm that moves inside a tree.

original: / ko kki la ni nags kyi sbrang bu'o //
analyzed: / ko kki la ni nags kyi sbrang bu'o //
translated: The kokila is a forest bee.

original: phye ma gsum po 'di 'thungs nas mi ni yi dags dang 'dra bar smyo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phye ma gsum po 'di 'thungs nas mi ni yi dags dang 'dra bar smyo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having drunk these three powders, a man becomes mad, like a ghost.

original: bu ram dang rtsab mo 'thungs pa las rnal mar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bu ram dang rtsab mo 'thungs pa las rnal mar gnas pa'o //
translated: By drinking molasses and sugar cane juice, one is restored to health.

original: skye gnyis ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: skye gnyis ni bram ze'o //
translated: The two births are the brahmin.

original: khyi 'tshe ni g-yung po'o //
analyzed: khyi 'tshe ni g-yung po'o //
translated: The dog-killer is the cat.

original: bya rog dgra ni 'ug pa'o //
analyzed: bya rog dgra ni 'ug pa'o //
translated: The crow-enemy is the owl.

original: srog chags tsa ra ma ni byi la'o //
analyzed: srog chags tsa ra ma ni byi la'o //
translated: The animal tsarama is the cat.

original: de'i brun dang lhan cig spu drug phye mar byas pa rnams 'thungs nas sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i brun dang lhan cig spu drug phye mar byas pa rnams 'thungs nas sngar bzhin no //
translated: By drinking the ashes of its dung together with the six hairs ground to powder, one is restored to health as before.

original: ba lang 'phel ni ce sbyang ngo //🔽bzhag pa gsal ba las rjod byed zhi ba'o //
analyzed: ba lang 'phel ni ce sbyang ngo // bzhag pa gsal ba las rjod byed zhi ba'o //
translated: The cow-enlarger is the mongoose.

original: zangs kyi gtsug phud can ni khyim bya'o //
analyzed: zangs kyi gtsug phud can ni khyim bya'o //
translated: The one with the copper crest is the cock.

original: gsum po rnams kyi brun dang 'bras bu gnyis phye mar byas pa mgo bo la bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: gsum po rnams kyi brun dang 'bras bu gnyis phye mar byas pa mgo bo la bzhag pa'o //
translated: The ashes of the dung of the three together with the two fruits ground to powder are placed on the head.

original: skra bregs pas rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: skra bregs pas rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
translated: By shaving, one is restored to health.

original: dam tshig chen po ni mi sha'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni mi sha'o //
translated: The great vow is the human.

original: 'chi ba ni gal te bu ram dang rtsab mo dag mi mthun na'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni gal te bu ram dang rtsab mo dag mi mthun na'o //
translated: Death is if molasses and sugar cane juice are incompatible.

original: bi tsu mar nga ni shing ni ma pa'o //
analyzed: bi tsu mar nga ni shing ni ma pa'o //
translated: The bichu marnga is the nimba tree.

original: lag pa gang gis bya rog gi tshang gi shing bzung ba de kho nas dur khrod kyi shing bzung nas gnyis ka gcig tu bsregs pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa gang gis bya rog gi tshang gi shing bzung ba de kho nas dur khrod kyi shing bzung nas gnyis ka gcig tu bsregs pa'o //
translated: With the same hand that held the crow's nest stick, he held the stick from the charnel ground and burned both together.

original: gsang zhes pa 'dis bzhag pa'i thal ba sus kyang mi shes par 'gyur ba ltar ro zhes gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: gsang zhes pa 'dis bzhag pa'i thal ba sus kyang mi shes par 'gyur ba ltar ro zhes gsal bar byas so //
translated: This secret indicates that no one will know the ashes that are placed there.

original: dga' bcas ma ni khyi mo'o //
analyzed: dga' bcas ma ni khyi mo'o //
translated: The female with joy is a bitch.

original: sbrang bu ni sbrang bu nyid do //
analyzed: sbrang bu ni sbrang bu nyid do //
translated: The insect is a fly.

original: de phye ma rang gi khu ba dang ldan pas rgyu skar rgyal la bzung bas bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: de phye ma rang gi khu ba dang ldan pas rgyu skar rgyal la bzung bas bsnun pa'o //
translated: The powder is the powder of that insect mixed with its own fluid, which is held in the asterism Puṣya and struck.

original: bud med ni mo rtags brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bud med ni mo rtags brjod par bya ste /
translated: The female is the female organ,

original: som ba la l'i dang / ai ndra b'a ru n'i la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: som ba la l'i dang / ai ndra b'a ru n'i la sogs pa ste /
translated: such as the Sombhalas, Indravāruṇīs, and so on.

original: 'khris shing ni 'khris shing nyid do //
analyzed: 'khris shing ni 'khris shing nyid do //
translated: The encircling tree is the encircling tree.

original: de yang des dkris shing bskor ba'o //
analyzed: de yang des dkris shing bskor ba'o //
translated: It is also encircled and surrounded by that.

original: skyes pa ni pho rtags brjod par bya ste shing aa mra la sogs pa'o //🔽de dag gi @234a * //
analyzed: skyes pa ni pho rtags brjod par bya ste shing aa mra la sogs pa'o // de dag gi @234a * //
translated: The male is the male organ, such as the mango tree and so on.

original: 'dab ma'i phye ma mnyam par bsres pa'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma'i phye ma mnyam par bsres pa'o //
translated: The powder is the powder of their leaves mixed together.🔽 The female is the female organ.

original: glang po che'i ste lag ldan gyi chang 'gram pa las skyes pa bu mo'i lag par bzhag pas /
analyzed: glang po che'i ste lag ldan gyi chang 'gram pa las skyes pa bu mo'i lag par bzhag pas /
translated: The elephant, that is, the tusker, is born from the side of the wine.

original: bag ma byed pa na ni khyim thabs byed pa na ste mag pa'i lag pa 'dzin pa'i dus na'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bag ma byed pa na ni khyim thabs byed pa na ste mag pa'i lag pa 'dzin pa'i dus na'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: When the girl is married, that is, when she is given in marriage, the groom takes her hand.

original: 'byung po'i skra ni bhu ta ka sh'i zhes grags pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung po'i skra ni bhu ta ka sh'i zhes grags pa'o //
translated: The hair of the bhūta is known as bhūtakaśa.

original: bzhi po rnams kyi phye ma lan bdun du mchims bsgos pa rang gi khu ba dang ldan pa bud med kyis zos pa'am /
analyzed: bzhi po rnams kyi phye ma lan bdun du mchims bsgos pa rang gi khu ba dang ldan pa bud med kyis zos pa'am /
translated: The powder of the four, perfumed seven times with the smoke of the cow, mixed with one’s own semen, is eaten by the woman.

original: bzhag pa'am de la des reg pas zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba ni 'dir 'brel bar bya'o //
analyzed: bzhag pa'am de la des reg pas zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba ni 'dir 'brel bar bya'o //
translated: Or it is placed, or touched by her, as will be explained. This is the connection here.

original: a'a ba na n'a ni ao n'a yi zhes grags pa'o //
analyzed: a'a ba na n'a ni ao n'a yi zhes grags pa'o //
translated: The āvanā is known as āvanā.

original: bzhi po rnams kyi phye ma 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba yang khu ba dang bral ba sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi po rnams kyi phye ma 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba yang khu ba dang bral ba sngar bzhin no //
translated: The powder of the four, as will be explained, is without semen, as before.

original: kr'a na d'a ni pi shnu kr'a na d'a'o //
analyzed: kr'a na d'a ni pi shnu kr'a na d'a'o //
translated: The karaṇḍā is the pistil of the karaṇḍa.

original: shra ba na ti ni du byed ma'o //
analyzed: shra ba na ti ni du byed ma'o //
translated: The śravanati is the female bee.

original: shing la gsha na ni grags pa'o //
analyzed: shing la gsha na ni grags pa'o //
translated: The śivaliṅga is well known.

original: aa ba na t'i ni thal sbyar byas te /
analyzed: aa ba na t'i ni thal sbyar byas te /
translated: Avana-tini is the union of the palms.

original: ha st'u bo di zhes grags pa'o //
analyzed: ha st'u bo di zhes grags pa'o //
translated: Ha-stau is known as the forehead.

original: mig las byung ni mig rnag dag go //
analyzed: mig las byung ni mig rnag dag go //
translated: Nayanaja is eye-discharge.

original: khyim gyi mchil pa'i mgo bo'o //
analyzed: khyim gyi mchil pa'i mgo bo'o //
translated: Ghar-ma-shira is the head of the house-saliva.

original: rang lus kyi rma las byung ba ni ming med kyi khrag go //
analyzed: rang lus kyi rma las byung ba ni ming med kyi khrag go //
translated: Svayam-shonita is the blood of the penis.

original: lnga po 'di rnams kyis byugs pa ste /
analyzed: lnga po 'di rnams kyis byugs pa ste /
translated: These five are the ointments.

original: byugs pa ni bskus pa'o //
analyzed: byugs pa ni bskus pa'o //
translated: Ointment is anointing.

original: r'a ma d'u t'i ni na ga d'a na t'i zhes dang ha sti d'a n'a t'i zhes grags pa'o //
analyzed: r'a ma d'u t'i ni na ga d'a na t'i zhes dang ha sti d'a n'a t'i zhes grags pa'o //
translated: Rama-dutini is known as Naga-dana-tini and Ha-sti-dana-tini.

original: phye ma gsum gyi lan bdun du byas nas rang gi khu bas bsgos pas seng ldeng gi reng bu bsres pa so rtsi dang lhan cig zos pa'o //
analyzed: phye ma gsum gyi lan bdun du byas nas rang gi khu bas bsgos pas seng ldeng gi reng bu bsres pa so rtsi dang lhan cig zos pa'o //
translated: Having made three times seven powders, one should eat the Khadira stick mixed with tooth-powder, anointed with one's own semen.

original: lag gdub ces pa dung ngo //
analyzed: lag gdub ces pa dung ngo //
translated: The bracelet is a conch.

original: bud med shi ba'i lag pa la gnas pa dur khrod kyi me la bsregs pa du ra'i khu bas me bsad pa phye mar byas pa dur khrod kyi mes bsregs pa'i thal ba dang bud shing gi thal ba dang bcas pa rang gi khu ba dang bsres pa
analyzed: bud med shi ba'i lag pa la gnas pa dur khrod kyi me la bsregs pa du ra'i khu bas me bsad pa phye mar byas pa dur khrod kyi mes bsregs pa'i thal ba dang bud shing gi thal ba dang bcas pa rang gi khu ba dang bsres pa
translated: The ashes of a woman's hand that has been burned in a charnel ground fire, extinguished with the juice of a pomegranate, made into a powder, together with the ashes of a charnel ground fire and the ashes of firewood, mixed with one's own juice,

original: so rtsi dang lhan cig zos pa'am reg pas dbang du byed do //
analyzed: so rtsi dang lhan cig zos pa'am reg pas dbang du byed do //
translated: eaten or touched together with tooth powder, brings one under one's control.

original: bya'i bdag po'i 'khor lo ni su dar sh'a n'a'o //
analyzed: bya'i bdag po'i 'khor lo ni su dar sh'a n'a'o //
translated: The wheel of the lord of birds is sudarśana.

original: lha'i bdag po'i spos po ni ai ndra go ba'o //
analyzed: lha'i bdag po'i spos po ni ai ndra go ba'o //
translated: The incense of the lord of gods is indragrāha.

original: shi l'a ni ldong ros so //
analyzed: shi l'a ni ldong ros so //
translated: Śilā is red arsenic.

original: ro tsa na ni gi wang ngo //
analyzed: ro tsa na ni gi wang ngo //
translated: Roca is realgar.

original: ta la ni ba bla'o //
analyzed: ta la ni ba bla'o //
translated: Tela is sesame oil.

original: mri ga du rba ni rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: mri ga du rba ni rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: Mṛgadāru is well known.

original: dz'a tri k'a ni ru kra dza tra'o //
analyzed: dz'a tri k'a ni ru kra dza tra'o //
translated: Jātikā is rucajatrā.

original: lnga po rnams kyi phye ma lan bdun du mig chus bsgos pa bud med la 'phangs pa'o //
analyzed: lnga po rnams kyi phye ma lan bdun du mig chus bsgos pa bud med la 'phangs pa'o //
translated: The powder of the five, moistened with one's own tears seven times, is thrown at a woman.

original: bag ma'i nyin par shi ba'i mi'i me tog dang rtags la gnas pa'i ban du ka'i me tog dang lhan cig bsres pa'i khyo shug gi thal ba rang gi khu bas mnyes pa ste /
analyzed: bag ma'i nyin par shi ba'i mi'i me tog dang rtags la gnas pa'i ban du ka'i me tog dang lhan cig bsres pa'i khyo shug gi thal ba rang gi khu bas mnyes pa ste /
translated: The ashes of a married couple mixed with the flowers and insignia of a person who died on his wedding day and with Bandhuka flowers, moistened with one’s own semen.

original: @234b des bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: @234b des bsnun pa'o //
translated: “Penetrate” means to insert.

original: dbang du zhes pa ni bsnun pa las so //🔽shu dag ni shu dag nyid do //
analyzed: dbang du zhes pa ni bsnun pa las so // shu dag ni shu dag nyid do //
translated: “Under one’s control” means from the penetration.🔽“Nutmeg” is nutmeg itself.

original: bcad skye dkar po ni dur ba dkar po'o //
analyzed: bcad skye dkar po ni dur ba dkar po'o //
translated: “White mustard” is white mustard.

original: be'u 'phral du skyes pa'i lte ba'o //
analyzed: be'u 'phral du skyes pa'i lte ba'o //
translated: “The navel of a newly born calf” is the navel of a newly born calf.

original: dbang po'i nas ni dug mo nyungs kyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i nas ni dug mo nyungs kyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: “Mustard seed” is the fruit of black mustard.

original: bkra shis yod ni gi wang ngo //
analyzed: bkra shis yod ni gi wang ngo //
translated: “Auspicious” is costus root.

original: lnga po cha mnyam du bsres pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: lnga po cha mnyam du bsres pa rnams kyis so //
translated: “The five” are mixed in equal parts.

original: dpal mtha' dag ni tsandan dpal gyi dum bu'o //
analyzed: dpal mtha' dag ni tsandan dpal gyi dum bu'o //
translated: “All glory” is a piece of sandalwood.

original: tsandan dmar po ni tsandan dmar po nyid do //
analyzed: tsandan dmar po ni tsandan dmar po nyid do //
translated: “Red sandalwood” is red sandalwood itself.

original: ri bong 'dzin ni ga bur ro //
analyzed: ri bong 'dzin ni ga bur ro //
translated: “Musk” is camphor.

original: 'di rnams tshad mnyam pas so //🔽drang srong gi bu ni byi'u kha nya dza r'i ta'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams tshad mnyam pas so // drang srong gi bu ni byi'u kha nya dza r'i ta'o //
translated: These are in equal amounts.🔽“Sage’s son” is the bird known as the sparrow.

original: bong bu ni bong bu nyid do //
analyzed: bong bu ni bong bu nyid do //
translated: “Donkey” is an ass itself.

original: de dag gi khrag gis mnyes pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de dag gi khrag gis mnyes pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The drops that please them with their blood.

original: gi ri ka rni dkar po ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'o //
analyzed: gi ri ka rni dkar po ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'o //
translated: The white Girikarni is the white Aparajita.

original: phag ni phag pa ste /
analyzed: phag ni phag pa ste /
translated: The pig is a boar.

original: de'i so dang rgyu skar rgyal la gsum po mnyes pa'i thig le'o //
analyzed: de'i so dang rgyu skar rgyal la gsum po mnyes pa'i thig le'o //
translated: The teeth are the three drops that please it in the asterism Pushya.

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung gi rang bzhin //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung gi rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the relics of the Sugata.

original: so sor song ba la dkris pa zhes pa /
analyzed: so sor song ba la dkris pa zhes pa /
translated: The encirclement in the Pratipat.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi rang bzhin so sor song ba ni dbus su so sor bcug pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi rang bzhin so sor song ba ni dbus su so sor bcug pa ste /
translated: The nature of the relics of the Tathagata in the Pratipat is placed in the middle,

original: de la dkris pa'o //
analyzed: de la dkris pa'o //
translated: and it is encircled by that.

original: nyi ma ni zangs ma'o //
analyzed: nyi ma ni zangs ma'o //
translated: The sun is copper.

original: zla ba ni dngul lo //
analyzed: zla ba ni dngul lo //
translated: The moon is silver.

original: me ni gser ro //
analyzed: me ni gser ro //
translated: The fire is gold.

original: 'dir man ngag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung khrag gis mnyes pa'i dri ma dang mig gis dkris pa'i ri lu ste /
analyzed: 'dir man ngag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung khrag gis mnyes pa'i dri ma dang mig gis dkris pa'i ri lu ste /
translated: The instruction here is that the relics of the Tathagata are the pill that pleases with blood, and the eyes are the encirclement.

original: de la gser dang dngul dang zangs ma rnams kyis rim gyis dkris nas /
analyzed: de la gser dang dngul dang zangs ma rnams kyis rim gyis dkris nas /
translated: Having encircled them with gold, silver, and copper, respectively,

original: rgyu skar rgyal la lag par bzung ba la sngon du bzlas pa 'bum byas shing /
analyzed: rgyu skar rgyal la lag par bzung ba la sngon du bzlas pa 'bum byas shing /
translated: one should hold it in the hand in the asterism Pushya, having previously recited the mantra one hundred thousand times.🔽

original: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid dang ri lu la'ang bsgom zhing de'i sngags kyang bzlas pa /
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid dang ri lu la'ang bsgom zhing de'i sngags kyang bzlas pa /
translated: One should meditate on oneself and the pill as the form of one’s desired deity and also repeat its mantra.

original: dro ba dang du ba dang 'bar pa'i rjes thogs su khar bcug nas rgyu bar bya ste sus kyang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dro ba dang du ba dang 'bar pa'i rjes thogs su khar bcug nas rgyu bar bya ste sus kyang mi mthong ngo //
translated: After heat, smoke, and flame, one should place it in the mouth and move it, and no one will see it.🔽Here,

original: 'dir // gser ni drug nam gsum rnams dang / phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gnyis //
analyzed: 'dir // gser ni drug nam gsum rnams dang / phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gnyis //
translated: gold is six or three, and two ratis with half.

original: ra ti'i brgyad kyi cha yang ste //
analyzed: ra ti'i brgyad kyi cha yang ste //
translated: And also an eighth part of a rati.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid sbyor //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid sbyor //
translated: One should apply it to the nature of Cittavajra.

original: sku yi rang bzhin dngul yin te //
analyzed: sku yi rang bzhin dngul yin te //
translated: The nature of the body is silver.

original: drug nam bzhi rnams dang de nas //
analyzed: drug nam bzhi rnams dang de nas //
translated: Six or four, and then

original: ra ti'i rkang pa gsum rnams ni //
analyzed: ra ti'i rkang pa gsum rnams ni //
translated: three parts of a rati,

original: brgyad cha ldan pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: brgyad cha ldan pa rnams kyis so //
translated: endowed with an eighth part.🔽Copper is six or five, and endowed with a half rati,

original: zangs ni drug nam lnga rnams dang // phyed bcas ra ti ldan rnams dang // ra ti brgya rnams rkang pa dang // bcas pa gang gis gsum gyi rdzogs //
analyzed: zangs ni drug nam lnga rnams dang // phyed bcas ra ti ldan rnams dang // ra ti brgya rnams rkang pa dang // bcas pa gang gis gsum gyi rdzogs //
translated: and a hundred ratis with a part, by whom the three are complete.

original: zhes pa man ngag go //
analyzed: zhes pa man ngag go //
translated: This is the esoteric instruction.

original: kha cig ni gser la @235a * //
analyzed: kha cig ni gser la @235a * //
translated: Some say that gold

original: sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta bar /
analyzed: sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta bar /
translated: The rest are as follows:

original: drug nam gsum dang rig byed bzhi //
analyzed: drug nam gsum dang rig byed bzhi //
translated: six, three, four, and five,

original: ra ti bdun gsum lnga dang bcas //
analyzed: ra ti bdun gsum lnga dang bcas //
translated: with three and a half ratis.

original: zhes so // gzhan rnams na re /
analyzed: zhes so // gzhan rnams na re /
translated: Others say:

original: drug nam gsum dang bzhi dang lnga ste //
analyzed: drug nam gsum dang bzhi dang lnga ste //
translated: six, three, four, and five,

original: rkang pa gsum dang bcas pa'i ra ti gsum dang ra ti'i rkang pa gsum dang phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gcig dang lhan cig pa rnams so zhes so //
analyzed: rkang pa gsum dang bcas pa'i ra ti gsum dang ra ti'i rkang pa gsum dang phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gcig dang lhan cig pa rnams so zhes so //
translated: with three ratis and three and a half ratis.

original: gzhan rnams ni /
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni /
translated: Others say:

original: drug nam gsum dang bzhi dang lnga ste /
analyzed: drug nam gsum dang bzhi dang lnga ste /
translated: six, three, four, and five,

original: ra ti'i brgyad cha lnga dang bdun dang phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gcig dang ldan pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: ra ti'i brgyad cha lnga dang bdun dang phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gcig dang ldan pa'o zhes so //
translated: with five eighths of a rati and one and a half ratis.

original: bya rog nag po ni bsregs pa'i bya rog go //
analyzed: bya rog nag po ni bsregs pa'i bya rog go //
translated: Black crow is a burnt crow.

original: khu byug mo ni khu byug cig gi bu mo'o ;
analyzed: khu byug mo ni khu byug cig gi bu mo'o ;
translated: The cuckoo is the daughter of a cuckoo.

original: / mig ni mig nyid do //
analyzed: / mig ni mig nyid do //
translated: Eye is an eye.

original: mig rnams shri kha nda'i 'o mas mnyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gis dkris nas ril bu sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: mig rnams shri kha nda'i 'o mas mnyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gis dkris nas ril bu sngar bzhin no //
translated: Rub the eyes with the milk of a shrikhandī, wrap them with the bone of a tathāgata, and make a pill as before.

original: gdung gi rang bzhin gyi ri lu bsgrub pa gzhan no zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gdung gi rang bzhin gyi ri lu bsgrub pa gzhan no zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: Another is the pill made from the ashes of the bones of one who has been cremated together with his wife.

original: khyo shi ba dang lhan cig phud med bsregs pa'i thal ba la sogs pa gsum rang bzhin gyis rdul ba'i chus mnyes nas de nyid kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel dbus su byas te /
analyzed: khyo shi ba dang lhan cig phud med bsregs pa'i thal ba la sogs pa gsum rang bzhin gyis rdul ba'i chus mnyes nas de nyid kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel dbus su byas te /
translated: The ashes, etc. of one who has died with his wife are mixed with the water of the three white substances and the relics of the Sugata are placed in the middle of it.

original: ril bur byas pa sngar bzhin no //🔽shro ta ni mig sman shro ta'o //🔽ri bong mtshan ma ni she b'a la'o //
analyzed: ril bur byas pa sngar bzhin no // shro ta ni mig sman shro ta'o // ri bong mtshan ma ni she b'a la'o //
translated: The pill is made as before.🔽Srotam is collyrium.🔽Shasha is the mark of the hare.

original: tsher ma ni sa ma ko tsa'i tshe ma'o //
analyzed: tsher ma ni sa ma ko tsa'i tshe ma'o //
translated: Kshara is the thorn-apple plant.

original: sbrang rtsi ni sbrang mas byas pa'o //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi ni sbrang mas byas pa'o //
translated: Madhu is that made by bees.

original: mngar ba can ni shing mngar ro //
analyzed: mngar ba can ni shing mngar ro //
translated: Madhura is the sweet-flag plant.

original: na ba ha li n'i dag ni gsar pa'i l'am ga pi l'i'i me tog dang ka li ka dag ste /🔽de dag gi ke sa ra'i phung po gnyis kyang /
analyzed: na ba ha li n'i dag ni gsar pa'i l'am ga pi l'i'i me tog dang ka li ka dag ste / de dag gi ke sa ra'i phung po gnyis kyang /
translated: Navamallika is the flower of the new kalika.

original: gzhon nu ma rdul dang po can khrag gis mnyes nas ril bur byas pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma rdul dang po can khrag gis mnyes nas ril bur byas pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: A heap of these two kesaras is mixed with the blood of a young maiden in her first season and made into a pill as before.

original: aa shva ka sngon po'i 'byung ba zhes pa /🔽aa shva ka sngon po'i 'byung byed sa bon te /
analyzed: aa shva ka sngon po'i 'byung ba zhes pa / aa shva ka sngon po'i 'byung byed sa bon te /
translated: The arising of the blue aśoka flower.🔽The seed of the blue aśoka flower.

original: de'i myu gu'o //
analyzed: de'i myu gu'o //
translated: Its sprout.

original: bud med ni 'dir ce sbyang ste /
analyzed: bud med ni 'dir ce sbyang ste /
translated: A female mongoose here.

original: de'i khrag gis bdun du bsgos pa gser la sogs pas dkris pa sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i khrag gis bdun du bsgos pa gser la sogs pas dkris pa sngar bzhin no //
translated: Seven times smeared with its blood, wrapped in gold, etc., as before.

original: ril bu zhes pa sngags kyis btab pa ste sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: ril bu zhes pa sngags kyis btab pa ste sngar bzhin no //
translated: The pill is empowered with a mantra, as before.

original: ai gu d'i ni pri yang ku'o //
analyzed: ai gu d'i ni pri yang ku'o //
translated: The iguana is the prīyakū.

original: 'gegs pa ni shi ba'i bud med do //
analyzed: 'gegs pa ni shi ba'i bud med do //
translated: The obstruction is a dead woman.

original: ta gnyis pa'i zos pa'i mtha' ni zos pa'i lhag ma dor ba'o //
analyzed: ta gnyis pa'i zos pa'i mtha' ni zos pa'i lhag ma dor ba'o //
translated: The end of the eaten is the remainder of the eaten, the discarded.

original: zla ba gzas bzung ba ni ril bur byas pa sngags kyis btab pa sngar bzhin khar gnas pa ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba gzas bzung ba ni ril bur byas pa sngags kyis btab pa sngar bzhin khar gnas pa ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: The moon eclipse is made into a pill, empowered with a mantra, as before, placed in the mouth, and makes one invisible.

original: brtag pa'i mdzes ma ni yang dag 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtag pa'i mdzes ma ni yang dag 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The beautiful one of the treatise is the one who fulfills the desire for union.

original: pha'i nags @235b ni dur khrod de /
analyzed: pha'i nags @235b ni dur khrod de /
translated: The father’s forest is a charnel ground.

original: der zla ba gzas zin pa na mnyes pa /
analyzed: der zla ba gzas zin pa na mnyes pa /
translated: There, at the time of the moon eclipse, one should please.

original: dang po'i me tog dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma'i sgrub pa pos bsten pas skyes pa'i khu ba'o //
analyzed: dang po'i me tog dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma'i sgrub pa pos bsten pas skyes pa'i khu ba'o //
translated: The semen of a young woman who has the flower of youth, and who is served by the adept.

original: aa shva ka sngon po'i byang phyogs su bya rog gi tshang can du song ba'i myu gu zla ba gzas zin pa na blangs pa brjod pa'i khu bas bdar ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: aa shva ka sngon po'i byang phyogs su bya rog gi tshang can du song ba'i myu gu zla ba gzas zin pa na blangs pa brjod pa'i khu bas bdar ba rnams kyis so //
translated: The sprouts of a blue aśoka tree, which are taken when the moon is eclipsed, and are ground with the juice of the aforementioned.

original: phug ron gyi lto bar bcug cing dur khrod kyi mes btsos pa'i mig sman li ga bu mig byi la nag po'i khrag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: phug ron gyi lto bar bcug cing dur khrod kyi mes btsos pa'i mig sman li ga bu mig byi la nag po'i khrag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The ointment is placed in the belly of a pigeon, and cooked with a charnel ground fire. It is an ointment of the eye of a lizard, together with the blood of a black cat.

original: rgyu skar rgyal la 'phral du skyes pa'i gla sgang gi myu gus btags pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar rgyal la 'phral du skyes pa'i gla sgang gi myu gus btags pa'i sa'o //
translated: The earth is smeared with the sprouts of a śirīṣa tree, which is born immediately under the lunar mansion Puṣya.

original: mda' 'joms ni sbrang rtsi'i sbrang bu'o //
analyzed: mda' 'joms ni sbrang rtsi'i sbrang bu'o //
translated: Madhu is a honey bee.

original: 'di zhes pa 'di dag gis so //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa 'di dag gis so //
translated: These are the ingredients.

original: bton nas rab tu sbyor ba zhes pa rab tu sbyor ba dang sbed pa snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: bton nas rab tu sbyor ba zhes pa rab tu sbyor ba dang sbed pa snga ma bzhin te /
translated: Having extracted them, one should practice. The practice and concealment are as before.

original: 'on kyang ril bu khar gzhug go //
analyzed: 'on kyang ril bu khar gzhug go //
translated: However, one should place the pill in the mouth.

original: ka ni thod pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni thod pa'o //
translated: Ka is a skull.

original: sngon ma ni lus kyi stod la gnas pa'i mi'i rus pa'i thur ma'o //
analyzed: sngon ma ni lus kyi stod la gnas pa'i mi'i rus pa'i thur ma'o //
translated: The former is a human bone spoon located in the upper part of the body.

original: nyi ma zhes kha cig tu 'don pa la ni g-yas kyi lus su gtogs pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyi ma zhes kha cig tu 'don pa la ni g-yas kyi lus su gtogs pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: In the reading on the right side of the body, the meaning is on the right side of the body.

original: cho ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa'o //
translated: The rite is the yoga of the deity, etc.

original: sngags pa zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dang / 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: sngags pa zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dang / 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags bzlas pa'o //
translated: The mantra practitioner is the vajra holder, and the mantra is the mantra of the desired deity.

original: don ni 'di yin te shes rab dang gnas pa lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa gtor ma byin pa bzlas pa 'bum byas pa sngags klog cing /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te shes rab dang gnas pa lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa gtor ma byin pa bzlas pa 'bum byas pa sngags klog cing /
translated: The meaning is this: Endowed with the yoga of wisdom and the deity, having given the sacrificial offering, having done a hundred thousand recitations, the mantra practitioner,

original: 'byung po'i nyi ma la mtshan mo dur khrod du mi'i thod pa gsum gyi steng du gnas pa'i thod pa'i sha chen las skyes pa'i mar khu dang dur khrod kyi ras kyi sdong bus bud med kyi thod par dud pa chags pa bsnyil te gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'byung po'i nyi ma la mtshan mo dur khrod du mi'i thod pa gsum gyi steng du gnas pa'i thod pa'i sha chen las skyes pa'i mar khu dang dur khrod kyi ras kyi sdong bus bud med kyi thod par dud pa chags pa bsnyil te gzung bar bya'o //
translated: on an evil spirit day, at night in the charnel ground, standing on three human skulls, should collect the oil born from the great flesh of the skull, and with a wick of charnel ground cloth, should light a lamp in a woman's skull.

original: mtshan mo de nyid la 'ug pa'i mgo bo bsregs pa tsandan dmar pos lan bdun du bsgos pa phye mar byas la /
analyzed: mtshan mo de nyid la 'ug pa'i mgo bo bsregs pa tsandan dmar pos lan bdun du bsgos pa phye mar byas la /
translated: That very night, one should burn an owl’s head, and having anointed it seven times with red sandalwood, one should reduce it to powder.

original: dud pa de dang cha mnyam pas bsres pa bya rgod kyi rkang pa'i rus pa'i rkang sbubs su bcug ste /
analyzed: dud pa de dang cha mnyam pas bsres pa bya rgod kyi rkang pa'i rus pa'i rkang sbubs su bcug ste /
translated: One should mix it with the smoke of the same measure, and place it in the hollow of a vulture’s leg bone.🔽Having covered it with the skin of a vulture’s leg, one should place it in the center of the bhaga, and meditate on it.

original: bya rgod kyi rkang pa'i pags pas g-yogs nas bha ga'i dbus su bcug ste bsgom pa dang sngags kyi dbang las dro ba dang / du ba dang 'bar ba'i rjes thogs su /
analyzed: bya rgod kyi rkang pa'i pags pas g-yogs nas bha ga'i dbus su bcug ste bsgom pa dang sngags kyi dbang las dro ba dang / du ba dang 'bar ba'i rjes thogs su /
translated: From the empowerment of mantra, after heat, smoke, and flame,

original: de nas phyung la sngar gyi mi'i rus pa'i thur ma des mig sman du bya'o //
analyzed: de nas phyung la sngar gyi mi'i rus pa'i thur ma des mig sman du bya'o //
translated: one should then remove it and make it into eye ointment with the previously mentioned human bone probe.

original: de nas zhi ba'i lta stangs kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas zhi ba'i lta stangs kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, with a peaceful gaze, one will pacify.

original: rgyas pa'i lta stangs kyis rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i lta stangs kyis rgyas pa'o //
translated: With an enriching gaze, one will enrich.

original: dbang du bya ba'i lta stangs kyis dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba'i lta stangs kyis dbang du bya'o //
translated: With a magnetizing gaze, one will magnetize.

original: khro bo'i lta stangs kyis bgegs dang dgra rnams kun nas gcod par byed @236a * //🔽do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta stangs kyis bgegs dang dgra rnams kun nas gcod par byed @236a * //🔽do zhes pa'o //
translated: With an angry gaze, one will destroy all obstructors and enemies.

original: bsam gtan bzlas pa la dga' ba rnams kho na'i bcud kyi las kyi cho ga brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzlas pa la dga' ba rnams kho na'i bcud kyi las kyi cho ga brjod par bya'o //
translated: I will now describe the alchemical process for those who delight in the repetition of meditation.

original: cho ga de yang ma tshang ba nyid na /
analyzed: cho ga de yang ma tshang ba nyid na /
translated: And if that process is incomplete,

original: phongs pa dbul po la bde ba mi 'bab ste /
analyzed: phongs pa dbul po la bde ba mi 'bab ste /
translated: then happiness does not come to the poor and destitute.

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi'o //
translated: This is the attainment of desire.

original: gi ri ni mi'i glad pa'o //
analyzed: gi ri ni mi'i glad pa'o //
translated: Giri is human brain.

original: rgya mtsho skyes ni mi'i gcin gyi lan tshva'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho skyes ni mi'i gcin gyi lan tshva'o //
translated: Sāgara-jā is human urine salt.

original: de dag dang lhan cig dngul chu ste dngul chu nyid dang por rtsab mos bkrus pa byas shing 'dus byas pa'i skyur po ni rtsab mo ste /
analyzed: de dag dang lhan cig dngul chu ste dngul chu nyid dang por rtsab mos bkrus pa byas shing 'dus byas pa'i skyur po ni rtsab mo ste /
translated: Together with those, mercury, that is, mercury itself, first washed with sour gruel, is mixed with sour gruel.

original: des mngon par rtsabs pa dang bcas pa rdo ba tshan mor mang du mnyes pa la las nges par dud pa can gyi skyon dor nas zin par byed do //
analyzed: des mngon par rtsabs pa dang bcas pa rdo ba tshan mor mang du mnyes pa la las nges par dud pa can gyi skyon dor nas zin par byed do //
translated: Having been thoroughly ground with that on a hot stone, having removed the fault of definite smoke, it is completed.

original: skyur pos bkrus pa zhes 'don pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: skyur pos bkrus pa zhes 'don pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The reading washed with sour gruel is easy to understand.

original: sh'a kha dza l'a ni ru dan ti'o //
analyzed: sh'a kha dza l'a ni ru dan ti'o //
translated: Śākha-jālā is rudan-ti.

original: de'i mthar thug pa bzhi po cha mnyam pa rnams rtsab mo dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bskol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i mthar thug pa bzhi po cha mnyam pa rnams rtsab mo dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bskol bar bya'o //
translated: At the end of that, the four equal parts together with the root are boiled in a copper vessel.

original: de bzhin cha lus par bskol ba /
analyzed: de bzhin cha lus par bskol ba /
translated: Similarly, the remaining parts are boiled.

original: gi ri dang rgya mtsho skyes dang see na dha pa rnams dang bcas pa nyin zhag bdun du gzhag pa ni skyur por byas shing mngon par rtsab mor brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gi ri dang rgya mtsho skyes dang see na dha pa rnams dang bcas pa nyin zhag bdun du gzhag pa ni skyur por byas shing mngon par rtsab mor brjod par bya'o //
translated: Together with giri, sāmudra, and senādhāva, it is placed for seven days. It is said to be sour and very sharp.

original: de'i rjes su khab len gyi lcags ni khab len gyi lcags te /
analyzed: de'i rjes su khab len gyi lcags ni khab len gyi lcags te /
translated: After that, the iron of a magnet is the iron of a magnet.

original: de bdar ba'i phyir ma dang / ba ku la b'i dzi s'a ra dang autpala chen po padma ste /
analyzed: de bdar ba'i phyir ma dang / ba ku la b'i dzi s'a ra dang autpala chen po padma ste /
translated: Because it is rubbed, it is the mother, and bakula, jasmine, and great lotus are the stalks.

original: de'i yu ba zhes pa gsum dang byas pa'i skyur po dang lhan cig mnyes pa las mar gsar bzhin du dngul chu de smin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i yu ba zhes pa gsum dang byas pa'i skyur po dang lhan cig mnyes pa las mar gsar bzhin du dngul chu de smin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Together with the three and the sour, it is churned. Like fresh butter, that mercury is cooked.

original: de'i rjes su rdo rje can gyi 'o mas lan bdun du bsgos pa see na dha ba dang tshal dag dang lhan cig ma nur ba las zhu bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rjes su rdo rje can gyi 'o mas lan bdun du bsgos pa see na dha ba dang tshal dag dang lhan cig ma nur ba las zhu bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, it is anointed seven times with the milk of a she-elephant, together with senādhāva and the forest. It melts from the churning.

original: de'i rjes su zangs dang dngul so sor ka ra sha phyed kyi cha can te ma sha brgyad kyi tshad cig tu bskol te /
analyzed: de'i rjes su zangs dang dngul so sor ka ra sha phyed kyi cha can te ma sha brgyad kyi tshad cig tu bskol te /
translated: After that, copper and silver are each heated to the measure of eight māṣas, that is, half a karṣa.

original: tsher mas phug pa'i shog shog byas nas shog shog so so dngul chu de dang skyur pos byugs shing gandha b'a sha na ma sha bzhi bcug nas kong bu kha bcad par bskol bar bya ste /
analyzed: tsher mas phug pa'i shog shog byas nas shog shog so so dngul chu de dang skyur pos byugs shing gandha b'a sha na ma sha bzhi bcug nas kong bu kha bcad par bskol bar bya ste /
translated: Having made a wick with a thorn, each wick is smeared with the mercury and sour substances, and forty gandh bāṣaṇas are inserted. The pot is covered and heated.

original: de ltar dngul chu de zangs dang dngul gyi cha can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dngul chu de zangs dang dngul gyi cha can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, that mercury becomes the portion of copper and silver.

original: de ltar bskol nas 'du bar bya'o zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: de ltar bskol nas 'du bar bya'o zhes 'brel lo //
translated: Having heated it thus, it should be combined, the connection is.

original: gser phyed gang du yin pa de ni gser phyed can te da na di'o //
analyzed: gser phyed gang du yin pa de ni gser phyed can te da na di'o //
translated: That which is a half of gold is the half-gold one, that is, the dānadī.

original: de bskol ba'i t'a ra ser po'i lhag ma phyed dang lhan cig 'du bar bya ste tshos pa las so //
analyzed: de bskol ba'i t'a ra ser po'i lhag ma phyed dang lhan cig 'du bar bya ste tshos pa las so //
translated: That is heated together with the half of the remaining yellow tara, that is, from the cooked.

original: dus te khu ba bcing ba ni mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: dus te khu ba bcing ba ni mi gtong ba'o //
translated: Time is the binding of the liquid, that is, not letting it go.

original: sbyor ba'i sman gyi phyag rgya nges pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sman gyi phyag rgya nges pa'o //
translated: The seal of the medicine of application is ascertained.

original: sh'a li skyes ni sh'a li'i mar khu'o //
analyzed: sh'a li skyes ni sh'a li'i mar khu'o //
translated: Śālija is the oil of śāli.

original: @236b tsandan dmar po zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bstan pa si hla zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: @236b tsandan dmar po zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bstan pa si hla zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The brief indication “red sandalwood” is explained extensively by “camphor,” and so on.

original: de yang ku ndu ru yis ka kko la ni ka kko la las skyes pa rang byung gi me tog ste /
analyzed: de yang ku ndu ru yis ka kko la ni ka kko la las skyes pa rang byung gi me tog ste /
translated: Moreover, “from Kunduru” means from the kakkola, the flower of self-arisen.

original: bo la dang ka kko la sbyor ba las byung ba'i gnyis ka'i khu ba bsres pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bo la dang ka kko la sbyor ba las byung ba'i gnyis ka'i khu ba bsres pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the two nectars arise from the union of the bola and the kakkola.

original: sman chen 'di rnams dus drug rnams su /
analyzed: sman chen 'di rnams dus drug rnams su /
translated: These great medicines are in the six times.

original: 'di rnams kyis rab tu 'gyur bar bya'o zhes pa'i mthu can rnams te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis rab tu 'gyur bar bya'o zhes pa'i mthu can rnams te /
translated: They are the powerful ones who transform them.

original: mthu dang ldan pa rnams zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mthu dang ldan pa rnams zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are the powerful ones.

original: de la dpyid ni snga dro ste /
analyzed: de la dpyid ni snga dro ste /
translated: Spring is the morning,

original: de la bshad pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la bshad pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: and the explanation should be taken from that.

original: srog ni nyin phyed de de la rkang mar ro //
analyzed: srog ni nyin phyed de de la rkang mar ro //
translated: Life is midday, and it is bone marrow.

original: dbyar ni phyi dro ste /
analyzed: dbyar ni phyi dro ste /
translated: Summer is the afternoon,

original: de la gla rtsi'o //
analyzed: de la gla rtsi'o //
translated: and it is musk.

original: ston ka ni srod do //
analyzed: ston ka ni srod do //
translated: Autumn is evening,

original: de la sbubs can snum ste /
analyzed: de la sbubs can snum ste /
translated: and it is the oily one.

original: sbubs can bud med kyi sh'a li las skyes pa'i mar khu'o //
analyzed: sbubs can bud med kyi sh'a li las skyes pa'i mar khu'o //
translated: The oily one is the oil that arises from the śāli of a woman.

original: dgun ni nam phyed de /
analyzed: dgun ni nam phyed de /
translated: Winter is midnight,🔽and it is the great one.

original: der me tog las byung ba si hla ka'o //
analyzed: der me tog las byung ba si hla ka'o //
translated: There, the essence of flowers is camphor.

original: dgun smad ni tho rangs mtshan mo'i lhag ma ste /
analyzed: dgun smad ni tho rangs mtshan mo'i lhag ma ste /
translated: The end of winter is the remainder of the night at dawn.

original: de ga pur ro //
analyzed: de ga pur ro //
translated: That is camphor.

original: 'di ni dus kyi sman gyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dus kyi sman gyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: This is the application of seasonal medicine.

original: padma'i khrag ni rang byung gi me tog go //
analyzed: padma'i khrag ni rang byung gi me tog go //
translated: Lotus blood is a naturally occurring flower.

original: mar ni khu ba'o //
analyzed: mar ni khu ba'o //
translated: Butter is semen.

original: bzhi po 'di rnams dang lhan cig pa'i sngar bshad pa drug po ni bcu ste /
analyzed: bzhi po 'di rnams dang lhan cig pa'i sngar bshad pa drug po ni bcu ste /
translated: These four together with the previously mentioned six are ten.

original: rdzas ni bzhi dang bcu rnams so //
analyzed: rdzas ni bzhi dang bcu rnams so //
translated: The substances are four and ten.

original: rnam pa dgu zhes pa bu ga dgu'i dri ma dang bcas pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa dgu zhes pa bu ga dgu'i dri ma dang bcas pa rnams so //
translated: The nine types are the impurities of the nine orifices.

original: dus drug gi sman rnams la dri ma dgu rnams bsres pa rnams gcig tu bsres pa /
analyzed: dus drug gi sman rnams la dri ma dgu rnams bsres pa rnams gcig tu bsres pa /
translated: The seasonal medicines are mixed with the nine impurities.

original: dkar po'i phyogs la tshes gcig la sogs pa rnams su zla ba 'bab pas snar blugs par bya'o //
analyzed: dkar po'i phyogs la tshes gcig la sogs pa rnams su zla ba 'bab pas snar blugs par bya'o //
translated: On the bright fortnight, the moon falls on the first day of the lunar month and so on, and should be poured into the nostrils.

original: nag po'i phyogs la nyi mas zhes pa sbyor ba gcig go //
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs la nyi mas zhes pa sbyor ba gcig go //
translated: On the dark fortnight, the sun falls, and so on. This is one application.

original: dngul chu la sogs pa bzhi rnams de lta kho nar ro zhes pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: dngul chu la sogs pa bzhi rnams de lta kho nar ro zhes pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The four, quicksilver and so on, are just like that. This is the second.

original: sbyor ba gnyis ka yang nyi ma bdun phrag gsum rjes su bsgrub pa dang rjes su bsngags pa'ang mnyam mo //
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis ka yang nyi ma bdun phrag gsum rjes su bsgrub pa dang rjes su bsngags pa'ang mnyam mo //
translated: The procedure is the same for both, and the praise of the one is the praise of the other.

original: rjes su sgrub pa pos grub pa na /
analyzed: rjes su sgrub pa pos grub pa na /
translated: When the practitioner has succeeded,

original: de'i khu ba dang gci ba dang / brun byugs pa las bsregs pas lcags la sogs pa gser du byed do //
analyzed: de'i khu ba dang gci ba dang / brun byugs pa las bsregs pas lcags la sogs pa gser du byed do //
translated: he can transform iron and so on into gold by burning it with the urine, feces, and ashes of the practitioner.

original: n'a li n'i'i ste bud med kyi mar ni klad pa'o //
analyzed: n'a li n'i'i ste bud med kyi mar ni klad pa'o //
translated: The marrow of a nāli is the brain.

original: byis pa skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i mar ro //
analyzed: byis pa skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i mar ro //
translated: The marrow of a child is the marrow of a child who has not long been born.
